   34: -define(datadir(Conf), proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   35: -endif.

   39:          open/1, sets/1, bags/1, duplicate_bags/1, access/1, dirty_mark/1,
   40:          dirty_mark2/1, bag_next/1, oldbugs/1,

   42: 	 phash/1, fold/1, fixtable/1, match/1, select/1, update_counter/1,
   43:          badarg/1, cache_sets/1, cache_bags/1, cache_duplicate_bags/1,

   97:         otp_13229, otp_13260, otp_13830, receive_optimisation

  115: %% OTP-3621
  116: newly_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  117:     true = is_alive(),
  118:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  119:     [] = rpc:call(Node, dets, all, []),
  120:     peer:stop(Peer),
  121:     ok.
  122: 
  123: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  124:     Tab = dets_basic_test,
  125:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
  126: 
  127:     P0 = pps(),
  128:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
  129:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{mazda,japan}),
  130:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{toyota,japan}),
  131:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{suzuki,japan}),
  132:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{honda,japan}),
  133:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{renault,france}),
  134:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{citroen,france}),
  135:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{opel,germany}),
  136:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{saab,sweden}),
  137:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{volvo,sweden}),
  138:     [{opel,germany}] = dets:lookup(Tab,opel),
  139:     Japs = dets:traverse(Tab, fun(Obj) ->
  140:                                       case Obj of
  141:                                           {_, japan} -> {continue, Obj};
  142:                                           _ -> continue
  143:                                       end
  144:                               end),
  145:     4  = length(Japs),
  146:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
  147:     file:delete(FName),
  148:     check_pps(P0),
  149:     ok.
  150:     
  151: 
  152: open(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  153:     %% Running this test twice means that the Dets server is restarted
  154:     %% twice. dets_sup specifies a maximum of 4 restarts in an hour.
  155:     %% If this becomes a problem, one should consider running this
  156:     %% test on a peer node.
  157: 
  158:     {Sets, Bags, Dups} = args(Config),
  159:     
  160:     All = Sets ++ Bags ++ Dups,
  161:     delete_files(All),
  162: 
  163:     Data = make_data(1),
  164: 
  165:     P0 = pps(),
  166:     Tabs = open_files(1, All),
  167:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  168:     check(Tabs, Data),
  169: 
  170:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> ok = dets:close(Tab) end, Tabs),
  171:     %% Now reopen the files
  172:     ?format("Reopening closed files \n", []),
  173:     Tabs = open_files(1, All),
  174:     ?format("Checking contents of reopened files \n", []),
  175:     check(Tabs, Data),
  176:     %% crash the dets server
  177: 
  178:     ?format("Crashing dets server \n", []),
  179:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  180:     Procs = [whereis(?DETS_SERVER) | [dets:info(Tab, pid) || Tab <- Tabs]],
  181:     foreach(fun(Pid) -> exit(Pid, kill) end, Procs),
  182:     timer:sleep(100),
  183:     c:flush(),  %% flush all the EXIT sigs
  184:     timer:sleep(200),
  185: 
  186:     %% Now reopen the files again
  187:     ?format("Reopening crashed files \n", []),
  188:     open_files(1, All),
  189:     ?format("Checking contents of repaired files \n", []),
  190:     check(Tabs, Data),
  191: 
  192:     close_all(Tabs),
  193:     delete_files(All),
  194: 
  195:     {Ports0, Procs0} = P0,
  196:     Test = fun() ->
  197:                    P1 = pps(),
  198:                    {Ports1, Procs1} = P1,
  199:                    show("Old port", Ports0 -- Ports1),
  200:                    show("New port", Ports1 -- Ports0),
  201:                    show("Old procs", Procs0 -- Procs1),
  202:                    show("New procs", Procs1 -- Procs0),
  203:                    io:format("Remaining Dets-pids (should be nil): ~p~n",
  204:                              [find_dets_pids()]),
  205:                    true = Ports1 =:= Ports0,
  206:                    %% The dets_server process has been restarted:
  207:                    [_] = Procs0 -- Procs1,
  208:                    [_] = Procs1 -- Procs0,
  209:                    ok
  210:            end,
  211:     case catch Test() of
  212:         ok -> ok;
  213:         _ ->
  214:             timer:sleep(500),
  215:             ok = Test()
  216:     end.
  217:     
  218: check(Tabs, Data) ->
  219:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
  220: 		    Kp = dets:info(Tab, keypos),
  221: 		    ?format("checking ~p~n", [Tab]),
  222: 		    foreach(fun(Item) ->
  223: 				    case dets:lookup(Tab, k(Kp,Item)) of
  224: 					[Item] -> ok;
  225: 					_Other -> bad(Tab,Item)
  226: 				    end
  227: 			    end, Data)
  228: 	    end, Tabs),
  229:     ok.
  230:     
  231: k(Kp, Obj) -> element(Kp, Obj).
  232: 
  233: bad(_Tab, _Item) ->
  234:     ?format("Can't find item ~p in ~p ~n", [_Item, _Tab]),
  235:     exit(badtab).
  236: 
  237: %% Perform traversal and match testing on set type dets tables.
  238: sets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  239:     {Sets, _, _} = args(Config),
  240: 
  241:     Data = make_data(1),
  242:     delete_files(Sets),
  243:     P0 = pps(),
  244:     Tabs = open_files(1, Sets),
  245:     Bigger = [{17,q,w,w}, {48,q,w,w,w,w,w,w}], % 48 requires a bigger buddy
  246:     initialize(Tabs, Data++Bigger++Data), % overwrite
  247:     Len = length(Data),
  248:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> trav_test(Data, Len, Tab) end, Tabs),
  249:     size_test(Len, Tabs),
  250:     no_keys_test(Tabs),
  251:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> del_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  252:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  253:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> del_obj_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  254:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  255:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
  256:                     Len = dets:info(Tab, size) end,
  257:             Tabs),
  258:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> match_test(Data, Tab) end, Tabs),
  259:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> match_del_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  260:     
  261:     close_all(Tabs),
  262:     delete_files(Sets),
  263:     check_pps(P0),
  264:     ok.
  265: 
  266: %% Perform traversal and match testing on bag type dets tables.
  267: bags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  268:     {_, Bags, _} = args(Config),
  269:     Data = make_data(1, bag),  %% gives twice as many objects
  270:     delete_files(Bags),
  271:     P0 = pps(),
  272:     Tabs = open_files(1, Bags),
  273:     initialize(Tabs, Data++Data),
  274:     Len = length(Data),
  275:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> trav_test(Data, Len, Tab) end, Tabs),
  276:     size_test(Len, Tabs),
  277:     no_keys_test(Tabs),
  278:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> del_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  279:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  280:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> del_obj_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  281:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  282:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
  283:                     Len = dets:info(Tab, size) end,
  284:             Tabs),
  285:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> match_test(Data, Tab) end, Tabs),
  286:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> match_del_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  287:     close_all(Tabs),
  288:     delete_files(Bags),
  289:     check_pps(P0),
  290:     ok.
  291: 
  292: 
  293: %% Perform traversal and match testing on duplicate_bag type dets tables.
  294: duplicate_bags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  295:     {_, _, Dups} = args(Config),
  296:     Data = make_data(1, duplicate_bag), %% gives twice as many objects
  297:     delete_files(Dups),
  298:     P0 = pps(),
  299:     Tabs = open_files(1, Dups),
  300:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  301:     Len = length(Data),
  302:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> trav_test(Data, Len, Tab) end, Tabs),
  303:     size_test(Len, Tabs),
  304:     no_keys_test(Tabs),
  305:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> del_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  306:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  307:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> del_obj_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  308:     initialize(Tabs, Data),
  309:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
  310:                     Len = dets:info(Tab, size) end,
  311:             Tabs),
  312:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> match_test(Data, Tab) end, Tabs),
  313:     foreach(fun(Tab) -> match_del_test(Tab) end, Tabs),
  314:     close_all(Tabs),
  315:     delete_files(Dups),
  316:     check_pps(P0),
  317:     ok.
  318: 
  319: 
  320: access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  321:     Args_acc = [[{ram_file, true}, {access, read}],
  322: 		[{access, read}]],
  323:     Args = [[{ram_file, true}],
  324: 	    []],
  325:     
  326:     {Args_acc_1, _, _} = zip_filename(Args_acc, [], [], Config),
  327:     delete_files(Args_acc_1),
  328:     {Args_1, _, _} = zip_filename(Args, [], [], Config),
  329: 
  330:     P0 = pps(),
  331:     {error, {file_error,_,enoent}} = dets:open_file('1', hd(Args_acc_1)),
  332: 
  333:     Tabs = open_files(1, Args_1),
  334:     close_all(Tabs),
  335:     Tabs = open_files(1, Args_acc_1),
  336: 
  337:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
  338:                     {error, {access_mode,_}} = dets:insert(Tab, {1,2}),
  339:                     [] = dets:lookup(Tab, 11),
  340:                     '$end_of_table' = dets:first(Tab),
  341:                     {error, {access_mode,_}} = dets:delete(Tab, 22)
  342:             end, Tabs),
  343:     close_all(Tabs),
  344:     delete_files(Args_acc_1),
  345:     check_pps(P0),
  346:     ok.
  347: 
  348: 
  349: %% Test that the table is not marked dirty if not written.
  350: dirty_mark(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  351:     true = is_alive(),
  352:     Tab = dets_dirty_mark_test,
  353:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
  354:     P0 = pps(),
  355:     dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
  356:     dets:insert(Tab,{mazda,japan}),
  357:     dets:insert(Tab,{toyota,japan}),
  358:     dets:insert(Tab,{suzuki,japan}),
  359:     dets:insert(Tab,{honda,japan}),
  360:     dets:insert(Tab,{renault,france}),
  361:     dets:insert(Tab,{citroen,france}),
  362:     dets:insert(Tab,{opel,germany}),
  363:     dets:insert(Tab,{saab,sweden}),
  364:     dets:insert(Tab,{volvo,sweden}),
  365:     [{opel,germany}] = dets:lookup(Tab,opel),
  366:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
  367:     Call = fun(P,A) ->
  368: 		   P ! {self(), A},
  369: 		   receive
  370: 		       {P, Ans} ->
  371: 			   Ans
  372: 		   after 5000 ->
  373: 			   exit(other_process_dead)
  374: 		   end
  375: 	   end,
  376:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  377:     ok = ensure_node(20, Node),
  378:     %% io:format("~p~n",[rpc:call(Node, code, get_path, [])]),
  379:     %% io:format("~p~n",[rpc:call(Node, file, get_cwd, [])]),
  380:     %% io:format("~p~n",[Config]),
  381:     Pid = rpc:call(Node,erlang, spawn,
  382: 			 [?MODULE, dets_dirty_loop, []]),
  383:     {ok, Tab} = Call(Pid, [open, Tab, [{file, FName}]]),
  384:     [{opel,germany}] = Call(Pid, [read,Tab,opel]),
  385:     peer:stop(Peer),
  386:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName},
  387:                                     {repair,false}]),
  388:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
  389:     file:delete(FName),
  390:     check_pps(P0),
  391:     ok.
  392: 
  393: %% Test that the table is flushed when auto_save is in effect.
  394: dirty_mark2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     true = is_alive(),
  396:     Tab = dets_dirty_mark2_test,
  397:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
  398:     P0 = pps(),
  399:     dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
  400:     dets:insert(Tab,{toyota,japan}),
  401:     dets:insert(Tab,{suzuki,japan}),
  402:     dets:insert(Tab,{honda,japan}),
  403:     dets:insert(Tab,{renault,france}),
  404:     dets:insert(Tab,{citroen,france}),
  405:     dets:insert(Tab,{opel,germany}),
  406:     dets:insert(Tab,{saab,sweden}),
  407:     dets:insert(Tab,{volvo,sweden}),
  408:     [{opel,germany}] = dets:lookup(Tab,opel),
  409:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
  410:     Call = fun(P,A) ->
  411: 		   P ! {self(), A},
  412: 		   receive
  413: 		       {P, Ans} ->
  414: 			   Ans
  415: 		   after 5000 ->
  416: 			   exit(other_process_dead)
  417: 		   end
  418: 	   end,
  419:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  420:     ok = ensure_node(20, Node),
  421:     Pid = rpc:call(Node,erlang, spawn,
  422:                    [?MODULE, dets_dirty_loop, []]),
  423:     {ok, Tab} = Call(Pid, [open, Tab, [{file, FName},{auto_save,1000}]]),
  424:     ok = Call(Pid, [write,Tab,{mazda,japan}]),
  425:     timer:sleep(2100),
  426:     %% Read something, just to give auto save time to finish.
  427:     [{opel,germany}] = Call(Pid, [read,Tab,opel]),
  428:     peer:stop(Peer),
  429:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, FName}, {repair,false}]),
  430:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
  431:     file:delete(FName),
  432:     check_pps(P0),
  433:     ok.
  434: 
  435: dets_dirty_loop() ->
  436:     receive 
  437: 	{From, [open, Name, Args]} ->
  438: 	    Ret = dets:open_file(Name, Args),
  439: 	    From ! {self(), Ret},
  440: 	    dets_dirty_loop();
  441: 	{From, [read, Name, Key]} ->
  442: 	    Ret = dets:lookup(Name, Key),
  443: 	    From ! {self(), Ret},
  444: 	    dets_dirty_loop();
  445: 	{From, [write, Name, Value]} ->
  446: 	    Ret = dets:insert(Name, Value),
  447: 	    From ! {self(), Ret},
  448: 	    dets_dirty_loop();
  449:         {From, [close, Name]} ->
  450:             Ret = dets:close(Name),
  451:             From ! {self(), Ret},
  452:             dets_dirty_loop()
  453:     end.
  454: 
  455: 
  456: %% Check that bags and next work as expected.
  457: bag_next(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  458:     Tab = dets_bag_next_test,
  459:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
  460: 
  461:     %% first and next crash upon error
  462:     dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}, {type, bag}]),
  463:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{1,1},{2,2},{3,3},{4,4}]),
  464:     FirstKey = dets:first(Tab),
  465:     NextKey = dets:next(Tab, FirstKey),
  466:     [FirstObj | _] = dets:lookup(Tab, FirstKey),
  467:     [NextObj | _] = dets:lookup(Tab, NextKey),
  468:     {ok, FirstPos} = dets:where(Tab, FirstObj),
  469:     {ok, NextPos} = dets:where(Tab, NextObj),
  470:     crash(FName, NextPos+12),
  471:     {'EXIT',BadObject1} = (catch dets:next(Tab, FirstKey)),
  472:     bad_object(BadObject1, FName),
  473:     crash(FName, FirstPos+12),
  474:     {'EXIT',BadObject2} = (catch dets:first(Tab)),
  475:     bad_object(BadObject2, FName),
  476:     dets:close(Tab),
  477:     file:delete(FName),
  478: 
  479:     P0 = pps(),
  480:     dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}, {type, bag}]),
  481:     dets:insert(Tab,{698,hopp}),
  482:     dets:insert(Tab,{186,hopp}),
  483:     dets:insert(Tab,{hej,hopp}),
  484:     dets:insert(Tab,{186,plopp}),
  485:     Loop = fun(N, Last, Self) ->
  486: 		   case N of
  487: 		       0 ->
  488: 			   exit({unterminated_first_next_sequence, N, Last});
  489: 		       _ ->
  490: 			   case Last of
  491: 			       '$end_of_table' ->
  492: 				   ok;
  493: 			       _ ->
  494: 				   Self(N-1, dets:next(Tab,Last), Self)
  495: 			   end
  496: 		   end
  497: 	   end,
  498:     ok = Loop(4,dets:first(Tab),Loop),
  499:     dets:close(Tab),
  500:     file:delete(FName),
  501:     check_pps(P0),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: oldbugs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  505:     FName = filename(dets_suite_oldbugs_test, Config),
  506:     P0 = pps(),
  507:     {ok, ob} = dets:open_file(ob, [{type, bag}, {file, FName}]),
  508:     ok = dets:insert(ob, {1, 2}),
  509:     ok = dets:insert(ob, {1,3}),
  510:     ok = dets:insert(ob, {1, 2}),
  511:     2 = dets:info(ob, size),  %% assertion
  512:     ok = dets:close(ob),
  513:     file:delete(FName),
  514:     check_pps(P0),
  515:     ok.
  516: 
  517: %% Test that a file where the segment array has been truncated
  518: %% is possible to repair.
  519: truncated_segment_array(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  520:     TabRef = dets_suite_truncated_segment_array_test,
  521:     Fname = filename(TabRef, Config),
  522:     %% Create file that needs to be repaired
  523:     file:delete(Fname),
  524:     P0 = pps(),
  525:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}]),
  526:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  527:     
  528:     %% Truncate the file
  529:     HeadSize = headsz(),
  530:     truncate(Fname, HeadSize + 10),
  531:     
  532:     %% Open the truncated file
  533:     io:format("Expect repair:~n"),
  534:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef,
  535: 					[{file, Fname}, {repair, true}]),
  536:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  537:     file:delete(Fname),
  538:     check_pps(P0),
  539:     ok.
  540: 
  541: %% Test open_file/1.
  542: open_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  543:     T = open_v9,
  544:     Fname = filename(T, Config),
  545:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{file,Fname}]),
  546:     9 = dets:info(T, version), % Backwards compatibility.
  547:     true = [self()] =:= dets:info(T, users),
  548:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{file,Fname}]),
  549:     true = [self(),self()] =:= dets:info(T, users),
  550:     ok = dets:close(T),
  551:     true = [self()] =:= dets:info(T, users),
  552:     ok = dets:close(T),
  553:     undefined = ets:info(T, users),
  554:     file:delete(Fname),
  555: 
  556:     open_1(Config).
  557: 
  558: open_1(Config) ->
  559:     TabRef = open_file_1_test,
  560:     Fname = filename(TabRef, Config),
  561:     file:delete(Fname),
  562: 
  563:     P0 = pps(),
  564:     {error,{file_error,Fname,enoent}} = dets:open_file(Fname),
  565:     
  566:     ok = file:write_file(Fname, duplicate(100,65)),
  567:     {error,{not_a_dets_file,Fname}} = dets:open_file(Fname),
  568:     file:delete(Fname),
  569: 
  570:     HeadSize = headsz(),
  571:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}]),
  572:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  573:     truncate(Fname, HeadSize + 10),
  574:     true = dets:is_dets_file(Fname),
  575:     io:format("Expect repair:~n"),
  576:     {ok, Ref} = dets:open_file(Fname), % repairing
  577:     ok = dets:close(Ref),
  578:     file:delete(Fname),
  579: 
  580:     %% truncated file header, invalid type
  581:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
  582:     ok = ins(TabRef, 3000),
  583:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  584:     TypePos = 12,
  585:     crash(Fname, TypePos),
  586:     {error, {invalid_type_code,Fname}} = dets:open_file(Fname),
  587:     truncate(Fname, HeadSize - 10),
  588:     {error,{not_a_dets_file,Fname}} = dets:open_file(Fname),
  589:     {error,{not_a_dets_file,Fname}} =
  590:         dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
  591:     file:delete(Fname),
  592: 
  593:     {error,{file_error,{foo,bar},_}} = dets:is_dets_file({foo,bar}),
  594:     check_pps(P0),
  595:     ok.
  596: 
  597: %% Test initialize_table/2 and from_ets/2.
  598: init_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  599:     %% Objects are returned in "time order".
  600:     T = init_table_v9,
  601:     Fname = filename(T, Config),
  602:     file:delete(Fname),
  603:     L = [{1,a},{2,b},{1,c},{2,c},{1,c},{2,a},{1,b}],
  604:     Input = init([L]),
  605:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{file,Fname},{type,duplicate_bag}]),
  606:     ok = dets:init_table(T, Input),
  607:     [{1,a},{1,c},{1,c},{1,b}] = dets:lookup(T, 1),
  608:     [{2,b},{2,c},{2,a}] = dets:lookup(T, 2),
  609:     ok = dets:close(T),
  610:     file:delete(Fname),
  611: 
  612:     init_table_1(Config),
  613:     fast_init_table(Config).
  614: 
  615: init_table_1(Config) ->
  616:     TabRef = init_table_test,
  617:     Fname = filename(TabRef, Config),
  618:     file:delete(Fname),
  619:     P0 = pps(),
  620: 
  621:     Args = [{file,Fname},{auto_save,120000}],
  622:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  623:     {'EXIT', _} =
  624: 	(catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(foo) -> bar end)),
  625:     dets:close(TabRef),
  626:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  627:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun() -> foo end)),
  628:     dets:close(TabRef),
  629:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  630:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:init_table(TabRef, nofun)),
  631:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  632: 	(catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(_X) -> end_of_input end, 
  633: 			       [{foo,bar}])),
  634:     dets:close(TabRef),
  635:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  636:     away = (catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(_) -> throw(away) end)),
  637:     dets:close(TabRef),
  638:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  639:     {error, {init_fun, fopp}} =
  640: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(read) -> fopp end),
  641:     dets:close(TabRef),
  642: 
  643:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  644:     dets:safe_fixtable(TabRef, true),
  645:     {error, {fixed_table, TabRef}} = dets:init_table(TabRef, init([])),
  646:     dets:safe_fixtable(TabRef, false),
  647:     ET = ets:new(foo,[]),
  648:     ok = dets:from_ets(TabRef, ET),
  649:     [] = get_all_objects(TabRef),
  650:     [] = get_all_objects_fast(TabRef),
  651:     true = ets:insert(ET, {1,a}),
  652:     true = ets:insert(ET, {2,b}),
  653:     ok = dets:from_ets(TabRef, ET),
  654:     [{1,a},{2,b}] = sort(get_all_objects(TabRef)),
  655:     [{1,a},{2,b}] = sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef)),
  656:     true = ets:delete(ET),
  657:     120000 = dets:info(TabRef, auto_save),
  658:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  659: 
  660:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{access,read} | Args]),
  661:     {error, {access_mode, Fname}} = dets:init_table(TabRef, init([])),
  662:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  663: 
  664:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  665:     {error, invalid_objects_list} =
  666: 	(catch dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[{1,2},bad,{3,4}]]))),
  667:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  668:     file:delete(Fname),
  669: 
  670:     L1 = [[{1,a},{2,b}],[],[{3,c}],[{4,d}],[]],
  671:     bulk_init(L1, set, 4, Config),
  672:     L2 = [[{1,a},{2,b}],[],[{2,q},{3,c}],[{4,d}],[{4,e},{2,q}]],
  673:     bulk_init(L2, set, 4, Config),
  674:     bulk_init(L2, bag, 6, Config),
  675:     bulk_init(L2, duplicate_bag, 7, Config),
  676:     bulk_init(L1, set, 4, 512, Config),
  677:     bulk_init([], set, 0, 10000, Config),
  678:     file:delete(Fname),
  679: 
  680:     %% Initiate a file that contains a lot of objects.
  681:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{min_no_slots,10000} | Args]),
  682:     ok = ins(TabRef, 6000),
  683:     Fun = init_fun(0, 10000),
  684:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, Fun,{format,term}),
  685:     All = sort(get_all_objects(TabRef)),
  686:     FAll = get_all_objects_fast(TabRef),
  687:     true = All =:= sort(FAll),
  688:     true = length(All) =:= 10000,
  689:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  690:     file:delete(Fname),
  691: 
  692:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{min_no_slots,4000} | Args]),
  693:     ok = ins(TabRef, 6000),
  694:     FileSize1 = dets:info(TabRef, file_size),
  695:     Fun2 = init_fun(0, 4000),
  696:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, Fun2),
  697:     FileSize2 = dets:info(TabRef, file_size),
  698:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  699:     true = FileSize1 > FileSize2,
  700:     file:delete(Fname),
  701: 
  702:     check_pps(P0),
  703:     ok.
  704: 
  705: bulk_init(Ls, Type, N, Config) ->
  706:     bulk_init(Ls, Type, N, 256, Config).
  707: 
  708: bulk_init(Ls, Type, N, Est, Config) ->
  709:     T = init_table_test,
  710:     Fname = filename(T, Config),
  711:     file:delete(Fname),
  712:     Input = init(Ls),
  713:     Args = [{ram_file,false}, {type,Type},{keypos,1},{file,Fname},
  714: 	    {estimated_no_objects, Est}],
  715:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
  716:     ok = dets:init_table(T, Input),
  717:     All = sort(get_all_objects(T)),
  718:     FAll = get_all_objects_fast(T),
  719:     true = All =:= sort(FAll),
  720:     true = length(All) =:= N,
  721:     true = dets:info(T, size) =:= N,
  722:     ok = dets:close(T),
  723:     
  724:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
  725:     All2 = sort(get_all_objects(T)),
  726:     FAll2 = get_all_objects_fast(T),
  727:     true = All =:= All2,
  728:     true = All =:= sort(FAll2),
  729:     ok = dets:close(T),
  730:     file:delete(Fname).
  731: 
  732: init(L) ->
  733:     fun(close) ->
  734: 	    ok;
  735:        (read) when [] =:= L ->
  736: 	    end_of_input;
  737:        (read) ->
  738: 	    [E | Es] = L,
  739: 	    {E, init(Es)}
  740:     end.
  741: 
  742: init_fun(I, N) ->
  743:     fun(read) when I =:= N ->
  744: 	    end_of_input;
  745:        (read) ->
  746: 	    {NewN, Items} = items(I, N, 1000, []),
  747: 	    {Items, init_fun(NewN, N)};
  748:        (close) ->
  749: 	    ignored
  750:     end.
  751: 
  752: fast_init_table(Config) ->
  753:     TabRef = init_table_test,
  754:     Fname = filename(TabRef, Config),
  755:     file:delete(Fname),
  756:     P0 = pps(),
  757: 
  758:     Args = [{file,Fname},{auto_save,120000}],
  759: 
  760:     Source = init_table_test_source,
  761:     SourceFname = filename(Source, Config),
  762:     file:delete(SourceFname),
  763:     SourceArgs = [{file,SourceFname},{auto_save,120000}],
  764: 
  765:     {ok, Source} = dets:open_file(Source, SourceArgs),
  766:     
  767:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  768:     {'EXIT', _} =
  769: 	(catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(foo) -> bar end, {format,bchunk})),
  770:     dets:close(TabRef),
  771:     file:delete(Fname),
  772:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  773:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun() -> foo end,
  774: 					       {format,bchunk})),
  775:     dets:close(TabRef),
  776:     file:delete(Fname),
  777:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  778:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  779: 	(catch dets:init_table(TabRef, nofun, {format,bchunk})),
  780:     dets:close(TabRef),
  781:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  782:     away = (catch dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(_) -> throw(away) end,
  783: 					{format,bchunk})),
  784:     dets:close(TabRef),
  785:     file:delete(Fname),
  786:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  787:     {error, {init_fun, fopp}} =
  788: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, fun(read) -> fopp end, {format,bchunk}),
  789:     dets:close(TabRef),
  790:     file:delete(Fname),
  791:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  792:     dets:safe_fixtable(TabRef, true),
  793:     {error, {fixed_table, TabRef}} =
  794: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([]), {format,bchunk}),
  795:     dets:safe_fixtable(TabRef, false),
  796:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  797: 
  798:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{access,read} | Args]),
  799:     {error, {access_mode, Fname}} =
  800: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([]), {format,bchunk}),
  801:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  802: 
  803:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  804:     {error, {init_fun,{1,2}}} =
  805: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[{1,2},bad,{3,4}]]), {format,bchunk}),
  806:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  807:     file:delete(Fname),
  808: 
  809:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  810:     {error, {init_fun, end_of_input}} =
  811: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([]),{format,bchunk}),
  812:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  813:     file:delete(Fname),
  814: 
  815:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  816:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  817: 	(catch dets:init_table(TabRef, init([]),{format,foppla})),
  818:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  819:     file:delete(Fname),
  820: 
  821:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  822:     ok = ins(TabRef, 100),
  823: 
  824:     [BParms | Objs] = collect_bchunk(TabRef, init_bchunk(TabRef)),
  825:     Parms = binary_to_term(BParms),
  826:     {error, {init_fun, <<"foobar">>}} =
  827: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[<<"foobar">>]]),{format,bchunk}),
  828:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  829:     file:delete(Fname),
  830: 
  831:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  832:     Parms1 = setelement(1, Parms, foobar),
  833:     BParms1 = term_to_binary(Parms1),
  834:     {error, {init_fun, BParms1}} =
  835: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[BParms1 | Objs]]),{format,bchunk}),
  836:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  837:     file:delete(Fname),
  838: 
  839:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  840:     [{Sz1,No1} | NoColls17] = element(tuple_size(Parms), Parms),
  841:     Parms2 = setelement(tuple_size(Parms), Parms, [{Sz1,No1+1} | NoColls17]),
  842:     BParms2 = term_to_binary(Parms2),
  843:     {error, invalid_objects_list} =
  844: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[BParms2 | Objs]]),{format,bchunk}),
  845:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  846:     file:delete(Fname),
  847: 
  848:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  849:     [{LSize1,Slot1,Obj1} | ObjsRest] = Objs,
  850:   
  851:     BadSize = byte_size(Obj1)-1,
  852:     <<BadSizeObj:BadSize/binary,_:1/binary>> = Obj1,
  853:     BadObjs = [{LSize1,Slot1,BadSizeObj} | ObjsRest],
  854:     {error, invalid_objects_list} =
  855: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[BParms | BadObjs]]),{format,bchunk}),
  856:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  857:     file:delete(Fname),
  858: 
  859:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  860:     <<Size:32,BigObj0/binary>> = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(16,Obj1)),
  861:     BigObj = <<(Size*16):32,BigObj0/binary>>,
  862:     BadColl = [BParms, {LSize1+4,Slot1,BigObj} | ObjsRest],
  863:     {error, invalid_objects_list} =
  864:          dets:init_table(TabRef, init([BadColl]),{format,bchunk}),
  865:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  866:     file:delete(Fname),
  867: 
  868:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  869:     BadObj = <<"foobar">>,
  870:     {error, invalid_objects_list} =
  871: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[BParms, BadObj]]),{format,bchunk}),
  872:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  873:     file:delete(Fname),
  874: 
  875:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{type,bag} | Args]),
  876:     {error, {init_fun, _}} =
  877: 	dets:init_table(TabRef, init([[BParms]]),{format,bchunk}),
  878:     _ = dets:close(TabRef),
  879:     file:delete(Fname),
  880: 
  881:     ok = dets:close(Source),
  882:     file:delete(SourceFname),
  883: 
  884:     L1 = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d}],
  885:     fast_bulk_init(L1, set, 4, 4, Config),
  886:     L2 = [{1,a},{2,b},{2,q},{3,c},{4,d},{4,e},{2,q}],
  887:     fast_bulk_init(L2, set, 4, 4, Config),
  888:     fast_bulk_init(L2, bag, 6, 4, Config),
  889:     fast_bulk_init(L2, duplicate_bag, 7, 4, Config),
  890:     fast_bulk_init(L1, set, 4, 4, 512, Config),
  891:     fast_bulk_init([], set, 0, 0, 10000, Config),
  892:     file:delete(Fname),
  893: 
  894:     %% Initiate a file that contains a lot of objects.
  895:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Source, [{min_no_slots,10000} | SourceArgs]),
  896:     Fun1 = init_fun(0, 10000),
  897:     ok = dets:init_table(Source, Fun1, {format,term}),
  898:     
  899:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{min_no_slots,10000} | Args]),
  900:     ok = ins(TabRef, 6000),
  901:     Fun2 = init_bchunk(Source),
  902:     true =
  903:         dets:is_compatible_bchunk_format(TabRef, 
  904:                                          dets:info(Source, bchunk_format)),
  905:     false = dets:is_compatible_bchunk_format(TabRef, <<"foobar">>),
  906:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, Fun2, {format, bchunk}),
  907:     ok = dets:close(Source),
  908:     file:delete(SourceFname),
  909:     All = sort(get_all_objects(TabRef)),
  910:     FAll = get_all_objects_fast(TabRef),
  911:     true = All =:= sort(FAll),
  912:     true = length(All) =:= 10000,
  913:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  914:     file:delete(Fname),
  915: 
  916:     %% Initiate inserts fewer objects than the table contains.
  917:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Source, [{min_no_slots,1000} | SourceArgs]),
  918:     ok = ins(Source, 4000),
  919:     
  920:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{min_no_slots,1000} | Args]),
  921:     ok = ins(TabRef, 6000),
  922:     FileSize1 = dets:info(TabRef, file_size),
  923:     Fun4 = init_bchunk(Source),
  924:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, Fun4, {format, bchunk}),
  925:     ok = dets:close(Source),
  926:     file:delete(SourceFname),
  927:     FileSize2 = dets:info(TabRef, file_size),
  928:     All_2 = sort(get_all_objects(TabRef)),
  929:     FAll_2 = get_all_objects_fast(TabRef),
  930:     true = All_2 =:= sort(FAll_2),
  931:     true = length(All_2) =:= 4000,
  932:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  933:     true = FileSize1 > FileSize2,
  934: 
  935:     %% Bchunk and fixed table.
  936:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  937:     NoItems = dets:info(TabRef, no_objects),
  938:     AllObjects1 = sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef)),
  939:     dets:safe_fixtable(TabRef, true),
  940:     true = dets:info(TabRef, fixed),
  941:     Cont1 = init_bchunk(TabRef),
  942:     NoDel =
  943: 	dets:select_delete(TabRef, [{{'_',{item,'_','_'}},[],[true]}]),
  944:     true = (NoDel > 0),
  945:     AllObjects2 = sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef)),
  946:     true = dets:info(TabRef, fixed),
  947:     Cont2 = init_bchunk(TabRef),
  948:     NoItems2 = dets:info(TabRef, no_objects),
  949:     true = (NoItems =:= NoItems2 + NoDel),
  950:     NoDel2 = dets:select_delete(TabRef, [{'_',[],[true]}]),
  951:     true = (NoDel2 > 0),
  952:     AllObjects3 = sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef)),
  953:     NoItems3 = dets:info(TabRef, no_objects),
  954:     true = (NoItems3 =:= 0),
  955:     true = dets:info(TabRef, fixed),
  956:     true = (NoItems2 =:= NoItems3 + NoDel2),
  957:     Cont3 = init_bchunk(TabRef),
  958: 
  959:     BinColl1 = collect_bchunk(TabRef, Cont1),
  960:     BinColl2 = collect_bchunk(TabRef, Cont2),
  961:     BinColl3 = collect_bchunk(TabRef, Cont3),
  962:     dets:safe_fixtable(TabRef, false),
  963:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  964:     file:delete(Fname),
  965: 
  966:     %% Now check that the above collected binaries are correct.
  967:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, Args),
  968:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, init([BinColl1]),{format,bchunk}),
  969:     true = (AllObjects1 =:= sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef))),
  970:     true = (length(AllObjects1) =:= dets:info(TabRef, no_objects)),
  971:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, init([BinColl2]),{format,bchunk}),
  972:     true = (AllObjects2 =:= sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef))),
  973:     true = (length(AllObjects2) =:= dets:info(TabRef, no_objects)),
  974:     ok = dets:init_table(TabRef, init([BinColl3]),{format,bchunk}),
  975:     true = (AllObjects3 =:= sort(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef))),
  976:     true = (length(AllObjects3) =:= dets:info(TabRef, no_objects)),
  977:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
  978:     file:delete(Fname),
  979:     check_pps(P0),
  980:     ok.
  981: 
  982: fast_bulk_init(L, Type, N, NoKeys, Config) ->
  983:     fast_bulk_init(L, Type, N, NoKeys, 256, Config).
  984: 
  985: fast_bulk_init(L, Type, N, NoKeys, Est, Config) ->
  986:     T = init_table_test,
  987:     Fname = filename(T, Config),
  988:     file:delete(Fname),
  989: 
  990:     Args0 = [{ram_file,false}, {type,Type},{keypos,1},
  991: 	    {estimated_no_objects, Est}],
  992:     Args = [{file,Fname} | Args0],
  993:     S = init_table_test_source,
  994:     SFname = filename(S, Config),
  995:     file:delete(SFname),
  996:     SArgs = [{file,SFname} | Args0],
  997: 
  998:     {ok, S} = dets:open_file(S, SArgs),
  999:     ok = dets:insert(S, L),
 1000: 
 1001:     Input = init_bchunk(S),
 1002:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1003:     ok = dets:init_table(T, Input, [{format,bchunk}]),
 1004:     All = sort(get_all_objects(T)),
 1005:     FAll = get_all_objects_fast(T),
 1006:     true = All =:= sort(FAll),
 1007:     true = length(All) =:= N,
 1008:     true = dets:info(T, size) =:= N,
 1009:     true = dets:info(T, no_keys) =:= NoKeys,
 1010:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1011:     
 1012:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1013:     All2 = sort(get_all_objects(T)),
 1014:     FAll2 = get_all_objects_fast(T),
 1015:     true = All =:= All2,
 1016:     true = All =:= sort(FAll2),
 1017:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1018:     file:delete(Fname),
 1019: 
 1020:     ok = dets:close(S),
 1021:     file:delete(SFname),
 1022:     ok.
 1023: 
 1024: init_bchunk(T) ->
 1025:     Start = dets:bchunk(T, start),
 1026:     init_bchunk(T, Start).
 1027: 
 1028: init_bchunk(Tab, State) ->
 1029:     fun(read) when State =:= '$end_of_table' ->
 1030: 	    end_of_input;
 1031:        (read) when element(1, State) =:= error ->
 1032: 	    State;
 1033:        (read) ->
 1034: 	    {Cont, Objs} = State,
 1035: 	    {Objs, init_bchunk(Tab, dets:bchunk(Tab, Cont))};
 1036:        (close) ->
 1037: 	    ok
 1038:     end.
 1039: 
 1040: collect_bchunk(Tab, Fun) ->
 1041:     collect_bchunk(Tab, Fun, []).
 1042: 
 1043: collect_bchunk(Tab, Fun, L) ->
 1044:     case Fun(read) of
 1045: 	end_of_input ->
 1046: 	    lists:append(lists:reverse(L));
 1047: 	{Objs, Fun2} when is_list(Objs) ->
 1048: 	    collect_bchunk(Tab, Fun2, [Objs | L]);
 1049: 	Error ->
 1050: 	    Error
 1051:     end.
 1052: 
 1053: items(I, N, C, L) when I =:= N; C =:= 0 ->
 1054:     {I, L};
 1055: items(I, N, C, L) ->
 1056:     items(I+1, N, C-1, [{I, item(I)} | L]).
 1057: 
 1058: %% Test open_file and repair.
 1059: repair(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1060:     %% The short lived format 9(a).
 1061:     %% Not very throughly tested here.
 1062:     A9 = a9,
 1063:     Version9aS = filename:join(?datadir(Config), "version_9a.dets"),
 1064:     Version9aT = filename('v9a.dets', Config),
 1065:     {ok, _} = file:copy(Version9aS, Version9aT),
 1066:     {ok, A9} = dets:open_file(A9, [{file,Version9aT}]),
 1067:     undefined = dets:info(A9, bchunk_format),
 1068:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}] = sort(dets:match_object(A9, '_')),
 1069:     ok = dets:insert(A9, {4,d}),
 1070:     ok = dets:close(A9),
 1071:     {ok, A9} = dets:open_file(A9, [{file,Version9aT}]),
 1072:     {error, old_version} = dets:bchunk(A9, start),
 1073:     ok = dets:close(A9),
 1074:     io:format("Expect forced repair:~n"),
 1075:     {ok, A9} = dets:open_file(A9, [{file,Version9aT},{repair,force}]),
 1076:     {_, _} = dets:bchunk(A9, start),
 1077:     ok = dets:close(A9),
 1078:     file:delete(Version9aT),
 1079: 
 1080:     repair_1(Config).
 1081: 
 1082: repair_1(Config) ->
 1083:     TabRef = repair_test,
 1084:     Fname = filename(TabRef, Config),
 1085:     file:delete(Fname),
 1086:     HeadSize = headsz(),
 1087: 
 1088:     P0 = pps(),
 1089:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
 1090: 	(catch dets:open_file(TabRef, [{min_no_slots,1000},
 1091: 				       {max_no_slots,500}])),
 1092:     {error,{file_error,hoppla,enoent}} = dets:file_info(hoppla),
 1093:     {error,{file_error,Fname,enoent}} =
 1094: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}, {access, read}]),
 1095: 
 1096:     %% compacting, and some kind of test that free lists are saved OK on file
 1097:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1098:     0 = dets:info(TabRef, size),
 1099:     ok = ins(TabRef, 30000),
 1100:     ok = del(TabRef, 30000, 3),
 1101:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1102:     {error, {access_mode,Fname}} =
 1103:         dets:open_file(foo, [{file,Fname},{repair,force},{access,read}]),
 1104:     {ok, Ref3} = dets:open_file(Fname), % no repair!
 1105:     20000 = dets:info(Ref3, size),
 1106:     20000 = dets:foldl(fun(_, N) -> N+1 end, 0, Ref3),
 1107:     20000 = count_objects_quite_fast(Ref3), % actually a test of match
 1108:     no_keys_test(Ref3),
 1109:     ok = dets:close(Ref3),
 1110:     {error,{keypos_mismatch,Fname}} =
 1111: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname},{keypos,17}]),
 1112:     {error,{type_mismatch,Fname}} =
 1113: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname},{type,duplicate_bag}]),
 1114: 
 1115:     %% make one of the temporary files unwritable
 1116:     TmpFile = Fname ++ ".TMP.1",
 1117:     file:delete(TmpFile),
 1118:     {ok, TmpFd} = file:open(TmpFile, [read,write]),
 1119:     ok = file:close(TmpFd),
 1120:     unwritable(TmpFile),
 1121:     {error,{file_error,TmpFile,eacces}} = dets:fsck(Fname),
 1122:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef,
 1123:                              [{repair,false},{file, Fname}]),
 1124:     20000 = length(get_all_objects(TabRef)),
 1125:     _ = histogram(TabRef, silent),
 1126:     20000 = length(get_all_objects_fast(TabRef)),
 1127:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1128:     writable(TmpFile),
 1129:     file:delete(TmpFile),
 1130: 
 1131:     truncate(Fname, HeadSize + 10),
 1132:     {error,{not_closed, Fname}} =
 1133: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}, {access, read}]),
 1134:     {error,{not_closed, Fname}} =
 1135: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}, {access, read}, 
 1136:                                 {repair,force}]),
 1137:     {error,{needs_repair, Fname}} =
 1138: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}, {repair, false}]),
 1139:     file:delete(Fname),
 1140: 
 1141:     %% truncated file header
 1142:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1143:     ok = ins(TabRef, 100),
 1144:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1145:     file:delete(Fname),
 1146: 
 1147:     %% FIXME.
 1148:     %% will fail unless the slots are properly sorted when repairing (v8)
 1149:     BArgs = [{file, Fname},{type,duplicate_bag},
 1150: 	     {delayed_write,{3000,10000}}],
 1151:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, BArgs),
 1152:     Seq = seq(1, 500),
 1153:     Small = map(fun(X) -> {X,X} end, Seq),
 1154:     Big = map(fun(X) -> erlang:make_tuple(20, X) end, Seq),
 1155:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, Small),
 1156:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, Big),
 1157:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, Small),
 1158:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, Big),
 1159:     All = sort(safe_get_all_objects(TabRef)),
 1160:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1161:     io:format("Expect forced repair:~n"),
 1162:     {ok, _} =
 1163:          dets:open_file(TabRef, [{repair,force},{min_no_slots,2000} | BArgs]),
 1164: 
 1165:     {MinNoSlots,_,MaxNoSlots} = dets:info(TabRef, no_slots),
 1166:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1167:     io:format("Expect compaction:~n"),
 1168:     {ok, _} =
 1169:         dets:open_file(TabRef, [{repair,force},
 1170:                                 {min_no_slots,MinNoSlots},
 1171:                                 {max_no_slots,MaxNoSlots} | BArgs]),
 1172:     All2 = get_all_objects(TabRef),
 1173:     true = All =:= sort(All2),
 1174:     FAll2 = get_all_objects_fast(TabRef),
 1175:     true = All =:= sort(FAll2),
 1176:     true = length(All) =:= dets:info(TabRef, size),
 1177:     no_keys_test(TabRef),
 1178:     Fun = fun(X) -> 4 = length(dets:lookup(TabRef, X)) end,
 1179:     foreach(Fun, Seq),
 1180:     _ = histogram(TabRef, silent),
 1181:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1182:     file:delete(Fname),
 1183: 
 1184:     %% object bigger than segments, the "hole" is taken care of
 1185:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file, Fname}]),
 1186:     Tuple = erlang:make_tuple(1000, foobar), % > 2 kB
 1187:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, Tuple),
 1188:     %% at least one full segment (objects smaller than 2 kB):
 1189:     ins(TabRef, 2000),
 1190:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1191: 
 1192:     {ok, _} =
 1193:         dets:open_file(TabRef, [{repair,false},{file, Fname}]),
 1194:     {ok, ObjPos} = dets:where(TabRef, {66,{item,number,66}}),
 1195:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1196:     %% Damaged object.
 1197:     Pos = 12, % v9: compaction fails, proper repair follows
 1198:     crash(Fname, ObjPos+Pos),
 1199:     io:format(
 1200: 	    "Expect forced repair (possibly after attempted compaction):~n"),
 1201:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{repair,force},{file, Fname}]),
 1202:     true = dets:info(TabRef, size) < 2001,
 1203:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1204:     file:delete(Fname),
 1205: 
 1206:     %% The file is smaller than the padded object.
 1207:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1208:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, Tuple),
 1209:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1210:     io:format("Expect forced repair or compaction:~n"),
 1211:     {ok, _} =
 1212: 	dets:open_file(TabRef, [{repair,force},{file, Fname}]),
 1213:     true = 1 =:= dets:info(TabRef, size),
 1214:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1215:     file:delete(Fname),
 1216: 
 1217:     %% Damaged free lists.
 1218:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1219:     ok = ins(TabRef, 300),
 1220:     ok = dets:sync(TabRef),
 1221:     ok = del(TabRef, 300, 3),
 1222:     %% FileSize is approximately where the free lists will be written.
 1223:     FileSize = dets:info(TabRef, memory),
 1224:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1225:     crash(Fname, FileSize+20),
 1226:     %% Used to return bad_freelists, but that changed in OTP-9622
 1227:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1228:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1229:     file:delete(Fname),
 1230: 
 1231:     %% File not closed, opening with read and read_write access tried.
 1232:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1233:     ok = ins(TabRef, 300),
 1234:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1235:     crash(Fname, ?CLOSED_PROPERLY_POS+3, ?NOT_PROPERLY_CLOSED),
 1236:     {error, {not_closed, Fname}} =
 1237:        dets:open_file(foo, [{file,Fname},{repair,force},
 1238:                             {access,read}]),
 1239:     {error, {not_closed, Fname}} =
 1240:        dets:open_file(foo, [{file,Fname},{repair,true},
 1241:                             {access,read}]),
 1242:     io:format("Expect repair:~n"),
 1243:     {ok, TabRef} =
 1244:        dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname},{repair,true},
 1245:                                {access,read_write}]),
 1246:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1247:     crash(Fname, ?CLOSED_PROPERLY_POS+3, ?NOT_PROPERLY_CLOSED),
 1248:     io:format("Expect forced repair:~n"),
 1249:     {ok, TabRef} =
 1250:        dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname},{repair,force},
 1251:                                {access,read_write}]),
 1252:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1253:     file:delete(Fname),
 1254: 
 1255:     %% The size of an object is huge.
 1256:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname}]),
 1257:     ok = dets:insert(TabRef, [{1,2,3},{2,3,4}]),
 1258:     {ok, ObjPos2} = dets:where(TabRef, {1,2,3}),
 1259:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1260:     crash(Fname, ObjPos2, 255),
 1261:     io:format("Expect forced repair:~n"),
 1262:     {ok, TabRef} = dets:open_file(TabRef, [{file,Fname},{repair,force}]),
 1263:     ok = dets:close(TabRef),
 1264:     file:delete(Fname),
 1265: 
 1266:     check_pps(P0),
 1267:     ok.
