 1269: 
 1270: %% Test version 9(b) with erlang:phash/2 as hash function.
 1271: phash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1272:     T = phash,
 1273:     Phash_v9bS = filename:join(?datadir(Config), "version_9b_phash.dat"),
 1274:     Fname = filename('v9b.dets', Config),
 1275:     {ok, _} = file:copy(Phash_v9bS, Fname),
 1276:     
 1277:     %% Deleting all objects changes the hash function. 
 1278:     %% A feature... (it's for free)
 1279:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, [{file, Fname}]),
 1280:     phash = dets:info(T, hash),
 1281:     dets:delete_all_objects(T),
 1282:     phash2 = dets:info(T, hash),
 1283:     [] = get_all_objects(T),
 1284:     [] = get_all_objects_fast(T),
 1285:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1286: 
 1287:     %% The hash function is kept when compacting a table.
 1288:     {ok, _} = file:copy(Phash_v9bS, Fname),
 1289:     io:format("Expect compaction:~n"),
 1290:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, [{file, Fname},{repair,force}]),
 1291:     phash = dets:info(T, hash),
 1292:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e}] =
 1293: 	lists:sort(dets:lookup_keys(T, [1,2,3,4,5])),
 1294:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1295: 
 1296:     %% The hash function is updated when repairing a table (no cost).
 1297:     {ok, _} = file:copy(Phash_v9bS, Fname),
 1298:     crash(Fname, ?CLOSED_PROPERLY_POS+3, 0),
 1299:     io:format("Expect repair:~n"),
 1300:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, [{file, Fname}]),
 1301:     phash2 = dets:info(T, hash),
 1302:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e}] =
 1303: 	lists:sort(dets:lookup_keys(T, [1,2,3,4,5])),
 1304:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1305:     
 1306:     %% One cannot use the bchunk format when copying between a phash
 1307:     %% table and a phash2 table. (There is no test for the case an
 1308:     %% Erlang/OTP R9 (or later) node (using phash2) copies a table to
 1309:     %% an Erlang/OTP R8 node (using phash).) See also the comment on
 1310:     %% HASH_PARMS in dets_v9.erl.
 1311:     {ok, _} = file:copy(Phash_v9bS, Fname),
 1312:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, [{file, Fname}]),
 1313:     Type = dets:info(T, type),
 1314:     KeyPos = dets:info(T, keypos),
 1315:     Input = init_bchunk(T),    
 1316:     T2 = phash_table,
 1317:     Fname2 = filename(T2, Config),
 1318:     Args = [{type,Type},{keypos,KeyPos},{file,Fname2}],
 1319:     {ok, T2} = dets:open_file(T2, Args),
 1320:     {error, {init_fun, _}} =
 1321: 	dets:init_table(T2, Input, {format,bchunk}),
 1322:     _ = dets:close(T2),
 1323:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1324:     file:delete(Fname2),
 1325: 
 1326:     file:delete(Fname),
 1327:     ok.
 1328: 
 1329: %% Test foldl, foldr, to_ets.
 1330: fold(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1331:     T = test_table,
 1332:     N = 100,
 1333:     Fname = filename(T, Config),
 1334:     file:delete(Fname),
 1335:     P0 = pps(),
 1336: 
 1337:     Args = [{file,Fname}, {estimated_no_objects, N}],
 1338:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1339: 
 1340:     ok = ins(T, N),
 1341: 
 1342:     Ets = ets:new(to_ets, [public]),
 1343:     dets:to_ets(T, Ets),
 1344:     true = N =:= ets:info(Ets, size),
 1345:     ets:delete(Ets),
 1346: 
 1347:     Ets2 = ets:new(to_ets, [private]),
 1348:     dets:to_ets(T, Ets2),
 1349:     true = N =:= ets:info(Ets2, size),
 1350:     ets:delete(Ets2),
 1351: 
 1352:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:to_ets(T, not_an_ets_table)),
 1353: 
 1354:     F0 = fun(X, A) -> [X | A] end,
 1355:     true = N =:= length(dets:foldl(F0, [], T)),
 1356:     true = N =:= length(dets:foldr(F0, [], T)),
 1357: 
 1358:     F1 = fun(_X, _A) -> throw(away) end, 
 1359:     away = (catch dets:foldl(F1, [], T)),
 1360:     away = (catch dets:foldr(F1, [], T)),
 1361: 
 1362:     F2 = fun(X, A) -> X + A end, 
 1363:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch dets:foldl(F2, [], T)),
 1364:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch dets:foldr(F2, [], T)),
 1365: 
 1366:     F3 = fun(_X) -> throw(away) end,
 1367:     away = (catch dets:traverse(T, F3)),
 1368: 
 1369:     F4 = fun(X) -> X + 17 end,
 1370:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch dets:traverse(T, F4)),
 1371: 
 1372:     F5 = fun(_X) -> done end,
 1373:     done = dets:traverse(T, F5),
 1374: 
 1375:     {ok, ObjPos} = dets:where(T, {66,{item,number,66}}),
 1376:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1377: 
 1378:     %% Damaged object.
 1379:     Pos = 8,
 1380:     crash(Fname, ObjPos+Pos),
 1381:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1382:     io:format("Expect corrupt table:~n"),
 1383:     BadObject1 = dets:foldl(F0, [], T),
 1384:     bad_object(BadObject1, Fname),
 1385:     BadObject2 = dets:close(T),
 1386:     bad_object(BadObject2, Fname),
 1387: 
 1388:     file:delete(Fname),
 1389:     check_pps(P0),
 1390:     ok.
 1391: 
 1392: %% Add objects to a fixed table.
 1393: fixtable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1394:     T = fixtable,
 1395:     Fname = filename(fixtable, Config),
 1396:     file:delete(Fname),
 1397:     Args = [{file,Fname}],
 1398:     P0 = pps(),
 1399:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1400: 
 1401:     %% badarg
 1402:     check_badarg(catch dets:safe_fixtable(no_table,true),
 1403: 		       dets, safe_fixtable, [no_table,true]),
 1404:     check_badarg(catch dets:safe_fixtable(T,undefined),
 1405: 		       dets, safe_fixtable, [T,undefined]),
 1406: 
 1407:     %% The table is not allowed to grow while the elements are inserted:
 1408: 
 1409:     ok = ins(T, 500),
 1410:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1411:     %% Now the table can grow. At the same time as elements are inserted,
 1412:     %% the table tries to catch up with the previously inserted elements.
 1413:     ok = ins(T, 1000),
 1414:     1000 = dets:info(T, size),
 1415:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1416:     file:delete(Fname),
 1417: 
 1418:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{type, duplicate_bag} | Args]),
 1419:     %% In a fixed table, delete and re-insert an object.
 1420:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, a, b}),
 1421:     SysBefore = erlang:timestamp(),
 1422:     MonBefore = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1423:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1424:     MonAfter = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1425:     SysAfter = erlang:timestamp(),
 1426:     Self = self(),
 1427:     {FixMonTime,[{Self,1}]} = dets:info(T,safe_fixed_monotonic_time),
 1428:     {FixSysTime,[{Self,1}]} = dets:info(T,safe_fixed),
 1429:     true = is_integer(FixMonTime),
 1430:     true = MonBefore =< FixMonTime,
 1431:     true = FixMonTime =< MonAfter,
 1432:     {FstMs,FstS,FstUs} = FixSysTime,
 1433:     true = is_integer(FstMs),
 1434:     true = is_integer(FstS),
 1435:     true = is_integer(FstUs),
 1436:     case erlang:system_info(time_warp_mode) of
 1437: 	no_time_warp ->
 1438: 	    true = timer:now_diff(FixSysTime, SysBefore) >= 0,
 1439: 	    true = timer:now_diff(SysAfter, FixSysTime) >= 0;
 1440: 	_ ->
 1441: 	    %% ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed) not timewarp safe...
 1442: 	    ignore
 1443:     end,
 1444:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, {1, a, b}),
 1445:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, a, b}),
 1446:     {FixMonTime,[{Self,1}]} = dets:info(T,safe_fixed_monotonic_time),
 1447:     {FixSysTime,[{Self,1}]} = dets:info(T,safe_fixed),
 1448:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1449:     1 = length(dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1450: 
 1451:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, '_'),
 1452:     %% In a fixed table, delete and insert a smaller object.
 1453:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, duplicate(100, e)}),
 1454:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1455:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, {1, '_'}),
 1456:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, a, b}),
 1457:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1458:     1 = length(dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1459: 
 1460:     ok = dets:delete_all_objects(T),
 1461:     %% Like the last one, but one extra object.
 1462:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, duplicate(100, e)}),
 1463:     ok = dets:insert(T, {2, duplicate(100, e)}),
 1464:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1465:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, {1, '_'}),
 1466:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, a, b}),
 1467:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1468:     2 = length(dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1469:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1470:     ok = dets:delete_all_objects(T),
 1471:     true = dets:info(T, fixed),
 1472:     0 = length(dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1473: 
 1474:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1475:     file:delete(Fname),
 1476:     check_pps(P0),
 1477:     ok.
 1478: 
 1479: %% Matching objects of a fixed table.
 1480: match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1481:     T = match,
 1482:     Fname = filename(match, Config),
 1483:     file:delete(Fname),
 1484:     P0 = pps(),
 1485: 
 1486:     Args = [{file,Fname}, {type, duplicate_bag}, {estimated_no_objects,550}],
 1487:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1488:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, a, b}),
 1489:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, b, a}),
 1490:     ok = dets:insert(T, {2, a, b}),
 1491:     ok = dets:insert(T, {2, b, a}),
 1492: 
 1493:     %% match, badarg
 1494:     MSpec = [{'_',[],['$_']}],
 1495:     check_badarg(catch dets:match(no_table, '_'),
 1496:                  dets, match, [no_table,'_']),
 1497:     check_badarg(catch dets:match(T, '_', not_a_number),
 1498:                  dets, match, [T,'_',not_a_number]),
 1499:     {EC1, _} = dets:select(T, MSpec, 1),
 1500:     check_badarg(catch dets:match(EC1),
 1501:                  dets, match, [EC1]),
 1502: 
 1503:     %% match_object, badarg
 1504:     check_badarg(catch dets:match_object(no_table, '_'),
 1505:                  dets, match_object, [no_table,'_']),
 1506:     check_badarg(catch dets:match_object(T, '_', not_a_number),
 1507:                  dets, match_object, [T,'_',not_a_number]),
 1508:     {EC2, _} = dets:select(T, MSpec, 1),
 1509:     check_badarg(catch dets:match_object(EC2),
 1510:                  dets, match_object, [EC2]),
 1511: 
 1512:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1513:     {[_, _], C1} = dets:match_object(T, '_', 2),
 1514:     {[_, _], C2} = dets:match_object(C1),
 1515:     '$end_of_table' = dets:match_object(C2),
 1516:     {[_, _], C3} = dets:match_object(T, {1, '_', '_'}, 100),
 1517:     '$end_of_table' = dets:match_object(C3),
 1518:     '$end_of_table' = dets:match_object(T, {'_'}, default),
 1519:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1520: 
 1521:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1522:     {[_, _], C30} = dets:match(T, '$1', 2),
 1523:     {[_, _], C31} = dets:match(C30),
 1524:     '$end_of_table' = dets:match(C31),
 1525:     {[_, _], C32} = dets:match(T, {1, '$1', '_'}, 100),
 1526:     '$end_of_table' = dets:match(C32),
 1527:     '$end_of_table' = dets:match(T, {'_'}, default),
 1528:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1529:     [[1],[1],[2],[2]] = sort(dets:match(T, {'$1','_','_'})),
 1530: 
 1531:     %% delete and insert while chunking
 1532:     %% (this case almost worthless after changes in OTP-5232)
 1533:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, '_'),
 1534:     L500 = seq(1, 500),
 1535:     Fun = fun(X) -> ok = dets:insert(T, {X, a, b, c, d}) end,
 1536:     foreach(Fun, L500),
 1537:     %% Select one object DI in L3 below to be deleted.
 1538:     {_, TmpCont} = dets:match_object(T, '_', 200),
 1539:     {_, TmpCont1} = dets:match_object(TmpCont),
 1540:     {TTL, _} = dets:match_object(TmpCont1),
 1541:     DI = hd(TTL),
 1542:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1543:     {L1, C20} = dets:match_object(T, '_', 200),
 1544:     true = 200 =< length(L1),
 1545:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, {'2','_','_'}), % no match
 1546:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, DI), % last object
 1547:     Tiny = {1050},
 1548:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tiny),
 1549:     true = member(Tiny, dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1550:     {_L2, C21} = dets:match_object(C20),
 1551:     {_L3, _C22} = dets:match_object(C21),
 1552:     %% It used to be that Tiny was not visible here, but since the 
 1553:     %% scanning of files was changed to inspect the free lists every
 1554:     %% now and then it may very well be visible here.
 1555:     %% false = member(Tiny, _L3),
 1556:     %% DI used to visible here, but the above mentioned modification
 1557:     %% has changed that; it may or may not be visible.
 1558:     %% true = member(DI, _L3),
 1559:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1560:     true = dets:member(T, 1050),
 1561:     true = member(Tiny, dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1562:     false = member(DI, dets:match_object(T, '_')),
 1563: 
 1564:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1565:     file:delete(Fname),
 1566: 
 1567:     N = 100,
 1568:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{estimated_no_objects,N} | Args]),
 1569:     ok = ins(T, N),
 1570:     Obj = {66,{item,number,66}},
 1571:     Spec = {'_','_'},
 1572:     {ok, ObjPos} = dets:where(T, Obj),
 1573:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1574:     %% Damaged object.
 1575:     crash(Fname, ObjPos+12),
 1576:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1577:     io:format("Expect corrupt table:~n"),
 1578:     case ins(T, N) of
 1579: 	      ok ->
 1580:                   bad_object(dets:sync(T), Fname);
 1581: 	      Else ->
 1582: 		  bad_object(Else, Fname)
 1583: 	  end,
 1584:     io:format("Expect corrupt table:~n"),
 1585:     bad_object(dets:match(T, Spec), Fname),
 1586:     io:format("Expect corrupt table:~n"),
 1587:     bad_object(dets:match_delete(T, Spec), Fname),
 1588:     bad_object(dets:close(T), Fname),
 1589:     file:delete(Fname),
 1590: 
 1591:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{estimated_no_objects,N} | Args]),
 1592:     ok = ins(T, N),
 1593:     {ok, ObjPos2} = dets:where(T, Obj),
 1594:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1595: 
 1596:     %% Damaged size of object.
 1597:     CrashPos = 1,
 1598:     crash(Fname, ObjPos2+CrashPos),
 1599:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1600:     case dets:insert_new(T, Obj) of % OTP-12024
 1601:         ok ->
 1602:             bad_object(dets:sync(T), Fname);
 1603:         Else3 ->
 1604:             bad_object(Else3, Fname)
 1605:     end,
 1606:     io:format("Expect corrupt table:~n"),
 1607:     case ins(T, N) of
 1608:         ok ->
 1609:             bad_object(dets:sync(T), Fname);
 1610:         Else2 ->
 1611:             bad_object(Else2, Fname)
 1612:     end,
 1613:     %% Just echoes...
 1614:     bad_object(dets:match(T, Spec), Fname),
 1615:     bad_object(dets:match_delete(T, Spec), Fname),
 1616:     bad_object(dets:close(T), Fname),
 1617:     file:delete(Fname),
 1618: 
 1619:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{estimated_no_objects,N} | Args]),
 1620:     ok = ins(T, N),
 1621:     {ok, ObjPos3} = dets:where(T, Obj),
 1622:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1623: 
 1624:     %% match_delete finds an error
 1625:     CrashPos3 = 16,
 1626:     crash(Fname, ObjPos3+CrashPos3),
 1627:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1628:     bad_object(dets:match_delete(T, Spec), Fname),
 1629:     bad_object(dets:close(T), Fname),
 1630:     file:delete(Fname),
 1631: 
 1632:     %% The key is not fixed, but not all objects with the key are removed.
 1633:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1634:     ok = dets:insert(T, [{1,a},{1,b},{1,c},{1,a},{1,b},{1,c}]),
 1635:     6 = dets:info(T, size),
 1636:     ok = dets:match_delete(T, {'_',a}),
 1637:     4 = dets:info(T, size),
 1638:     [{1,b},{1,b},{1,c},{1,c}] =
 1639: 	sort(dets:match_object(T,{'_','_'})),
 1640:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1641:     file:delete(Fname),
 1642: 
 1643:     check_pps(P0),
 1644:     ok.
 1645: 
 1646: %% Selecting objects of a fixed table.
 1647: select(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1648:     T = select,
 1649:     Fname = filename(select, Config),
 1650:     file:delete(Fname),
 1651:     P0 = pps(),
 1652: 
 1653:     Args = [{file,Fname}, {type, duplicate_bag},{estimated_no_objects,550}],
 1654:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1655:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, a, b}),
 1656:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1, b, a}),
 1657:     ok = dets:insert(T, {2, a, b}),
 1658:     ok = dets:insert(T, {2, b, a}),
 1659:     ok = dets:insert(T, {3, a, b}),
 1660:     ok = dets:insert(T, {3, b, a}),
 1661: 
 1662:     %% badarg
 1663:     MSpec = [{'_',[],['$_']}],
 1664:     check_badarg(catch dets:select(no_table, MSpec),
 1665:                  dets, select, [no_table,MSpec]),
 1666:     check_badarg(catch dets:select(T, <<17>>),
 1667:                  dets, select, [T,<<17>>]),
 1668:     check_badarg(catch dets:select(T, []),
 1669:                  dets, select, [T,[]]),
 1670:     check_badarg(catch dets:select(T, MSpec, not_a_number),
 1671:                  dets, select, [T,MSpec,not_a_number]),
 1672:     {EC, _} = dets:match(T, '_', 1),
 1673:     check_badarg(catch dets:select(EC),
 1674:                  dets, select, [EC]),
 1675: 
 1676:     AllSpec = [{'_',[],['$_']}],
 1677: 
 1678:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1679:     {[_, _], C1} = dets:select(T, AllSpec, 2),
 1680:     {[_, _], C2} = dets:select(C1),
 1681:     {[_, _], C2a} = dets:select(C2),
 1682:     '$end_of_table' = dets:select(C2a),
 1683:     {[_, _], C3} = dets:select(T, [{{1,'_','_'},[],['$_']}], 100),
 1684:     '$end_of_table' = dets:select(C3),
 1685:     '$end_of_table' = dets:select(T, [{{'_'},[],['$_']}], default),
 1686:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1687:     Sp1 = [{{1,'_','_'},[],['$_']},{{1,'_','_'},[],['$_']},
 1688: 	   {{2,'_','_'},[],['$_']}],
 1689:     [_,_,_,_] = dets:select(T, Sp1),
 1690:     Sp2 = [{{1,'_','_'},[],['$_']},{{1,'_','_'},[],['$_']},
 1691: 	   {{'_','_','_'},[],['$_']}],
 1692:     [_,_,_,_,_,_] = dets:select(T, Sp2),
 1693: 
 1694:     AllDeleteSpec = [{'_',[],[true]}],
 1695:     %% delete and insert while chunking
 1696:     %% (this case almost worthless after changes in OTP-5232)
 1697:     6 = dets:select_delete(T, AllDeleteSpec),
 1698:     L500 = seq(1, 500),
 1699:     Fun = fun(X) -> ok = dets:insert(T, {X, a, b, c, d}) end,
 1700:     foreach(Fun, L500),
 1701:     %% Select one object DI in L3 below to be deleted.
 1702:     {_, TmpCont} = dets:match_object(T, '_', 200),
 1703:     {_, TmpCont1} = dets:match_object(TmpCont),
 1704:     {TTL, _} = dets:match_object(TmpCont1),
 1705:     DI = hd(TTL),
 1706:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1707:     {L1, C20} = dets:select(T, AllSpec, 200),
 1708:     true = 200 =< length(L1),
 1709:     0 = dets:select_delete(T, [{{2,'_','_'},[],[true]}]),
 1710:     1 = dets:select_delete(T, [{DI,[],[true]}]), % last object
 1711:     Tiny = {1050},
 1712:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tiny),
 1713:     true = member(Tiny, dets:select(T, AllSpec)),
 1714:     {_L2, C21} = dets:select(C20),
 1715:     {_L3, _C22} = dets:select(C21),
 1716:     %% It used to be that Tiny was not visible here, but since the 
 1717:     %% scanning of files was changed to inspect the free lists every
 1718:     %% now and then it may very well be visible here.
 1719:     %% false = member(Tiny, _L3),
 1720:     %% DI used to visible here, but the above mentioned modification
 1721:     %% has changed that; it may or may not be visible.
 1722:     %% true = member(DI, _L3),
 1723:     true = dets:member(T, 1050),
 1724:     true = member(Tiny, dets:select(T, AllSpec)),
 1725:     false = member(DI, dets:select(T, AllSpec)),
 1726:     dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 1727:     true = dets:member(T, 1050),
 1728:     true = member(Tiny, dets:select(T, AllSpec)),
 1729:     false = member(DI, dets:select(T, AllSpec)),
 1730:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1731:     file:delete(Fname),
 1732: 
 1733:     %% The key is not fixed, but not all objects with the key are removed.
 1734:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1735:     ok = dets:insert(T, [{1,a},{1,b},{1,c},{1,a},{1,b},{1,c}]),
 1736:     6 = dets:info(T, size),
 1737:     2 = dets:select_delete(T, [{{'_',a},[],[true]}]),
 1738:     4 = dets:info(T, size),
 1739:     [{1,b},{1,b},{1,c},{1,c}] = sort(dets:select(T, AllSpec)),
 1740:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1741:     file:delete(Fname),
 1742: 
 1743:     check_pps(P0),
 1744:     ok.
 1745: 
 1746: %% Test update_counter/1.
 1747: update_counter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1748:     T = update_counter,
 1749:     Fname = filename(select, Config),
 1750:     file:delete(Fname),
 1751:     P0 = pps(),
 1752: 
 1753:     check_badarg(catch dets:update_counter(no_table, 1, 1),
 1754:                  dets, update_counter, [no_table,1,1]),
 1755: 
 1756:     Args = [{file,Fname},{keypos,2}],
 1757:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{type,set} | Args]),
 1758:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:update_counter(T, 1, 1)),
 1759:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1,a}),
 1760:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:update_counter(T, 1, 1)),
 1761:     ok = dets:insert(T, {0,1}),
 1762:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:update_counter(T, 1, 1)),
 1763:     ok = dets:insert(T, {0,1,0}),
 1764:     1 = dets:update_counter(T, 1, 1),
 1765:     2 = dets:update_counter(T, 1, 1),
 1766:     6 = dets:update_counter(T, 1, {3,4}),
 1767:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:update_counter(T, 1, {0,3})),
 1768:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1769:     file:delete(Fname),
 1770: 
 1771:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{type,bag} | Args]),
 1772:     ok = dets:insert(T, {0,1,0}),
 1773:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:update_counter(T, 1, 1)),
 1774:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1775:     file:delete(Fname),
 1776:     check_pps(P0),
 1777: 
 1778:     ok.
 1779: 
 1780: %% Call some functions with bad arguments.
 1781: badarg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1782:     T = badarg,
 1783:     Fname = filename(select, Config),
 1784:     file:delete(Fname),
 1785:     P0 = pps(),
 1786: 
 1787:     Args = [{file,Fname},{keypos,3}],
 1788:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T, [{type,set} | Args]),
 1789: 
 1790:     %% badargs are tested in match, select and fixtable too.
 1791: 
 1792:     %% open
 1793:     check_badarg(catch dets:open_file({a,tuple},[]),
 1794:                  dets, open_file, [{a,tuple},[]]),
 1795:     check_badarg(catch dets:open_file({a,tuple}),
 1796:                  dets, open_file,[{a,tuple}]),
 1797:     check_badarg(catch dets:open_file(file,[foo]),
 1798:                  dets, open_file, [file,[foo]]),
 1799:     check_badarg(catch dets:open_file({hej,san},[{type,set}|3]),
 1800:                  dets, open_file, [{hej,san},[{type,set}|3]]),
 1801: 
 1802:     %% insert
 1803:     check_badarg(catch dets:insert(no_table, {1,2}),
 1804:                  dets, insert, [no_table,{1,2}]),
 1805:     check_badarg(catch dets:insert(no_table, [{1,2}]),
 1806:                  dets, insert, [no_table,[{1,2}]]),
 1807:     check_badarg(catch dets:insert(T, {1,2}),
 1808:                  dets, insert, [T,{1,2}]),
 1809:     check_badarg(catch dets:insert(T, [{1,2}]),
 1810:                  dets, insert, [T,[{1,2}]]),
 1811:     check_badarg(catch dets:insert(T, [{1,2,3} | 3]),
 1812:                  dets, insert, [T,[{1,2,3}|3]]),
 1813: 
 1814:     %% lookup{_keys}
 1815:     check_badarg(catch dets:lookup_keys(T, []),
 1816:                  dets, lookup_keys, [badarg,[]]),
 1817:     check_badarg(catch dets:lookup(no_table, 1),
 1818:                  dets, lookup, [no_table,1]),
 1819:     check_badarg(catch dets:lookup_keys(T, [1 | 2]),
 1820:                  dets, lookup_keys, [T,[1|2]]),
 1821: 
 1822:     %% member
 1823:     check_badarg(catch dets:member(no_table, 1),
 1824:                  dets, member, [no_table,1]),
 1825: 
 1826:     %% sync
 1827:     check_badarg(catch dets:sync(no_table),
 1828:                  dets, sync, [no_table]),
 1829: 
 1830:     %% delete{_keys}
 1831:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete(no_table, 1),
 1832:                  dets, delete, [no_table,1]),
 1833: 
 1834:     %% delete_object
 1835:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete_object(no_table, {1,2,3}),
 1836:                  dets, delete_object, [no_table,{1,2,3}]),
 1837:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete_object(T, {1,2}),
 1838:                  dets, delete_object, [T,{1,2}]),
 1839:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete_object(no_table, [{1,2,3}]),
 1840:                  dets, delete_object, [no_table,[{1,2,3}]]),
 1841:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete_object(T, [{1,2}]),
 1842:                  dets, delete_object, [T,[{1,2}]]),
 1843:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete_object(T, [{1,2,3} | 3]),
 1844:                  dets, delete_object, [T,[{1,2,3}|3]]),
 1845: 
 1846:     %% first,next,slot
 1847:     check_badarg(catch dets:first(no_table),
 1848:                  dets, first, [no_table]),
 1849:     check_badarg(catch dets:next(no_table, 1),
 1850:                  dets, next, [no_table,1]),
 1851:     check_badarg(catch dets:slot(no_table, 0),
 1852:                  dets, slot, [no_table,0]),
 1853: 
 1854:     %% info
 1855:     undefined = dets:info(no_table),
 1856:     undefined = dets:info(no_table, foo),
 1857:     undefined = dets:info(T, foo),
 1858: 
 1859:     %% match_delete
 1860:     check_badarg(catch dets:match_delete(no_table, '_'),
 1861:                  dets, match_delete, [no_table,'_']),
 1862: 
 1863:     %% delete_all_objects
 1864:     check_badarg(catch dets:delete_all_objects(no_table),
 1865:                  dets, delete_all_objects, [no_table]),
 1866: 
 1867:     %% select_delete
 1868:     MSpec = [{'_',[],['$_']}],
 1869:     check_badarg(catch dets:select_delete(no_table, MSpec),
 1870:                  dets, select_delete, [no_table,MSpec]),
 1871:     check_badarg(catch dets:select_delete(T, <<17>>),
 1872:                  dets, select_delete, [T, <<17>>]),
 1873: 
 1874:     %% traverse, fold
 1875:     TF = fun(_) -> continue end,
 1876:     check_badarg(catch dets:traverse(no_table, TF),
 1877:                  dets, traverse, [no_table,TF]),
 1878:     FF = fun(_, A) -> A end,
 1879:     check_badarg(catch dets:foldl(FF, [], no_table),
 1880:                  dets, foldl, [FF,[],no_table]),
 1881:     check_badarg(catch dets:foldr(FF, [], no_table),
 1882:                  dets, foldl, [FF,[],no_table]),
 1883: 
 1884:     %% close
 1885:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1886:     {error, not_owner} = dets:close(T),
 1887:     {error, not_owner} = dets:close(T),
 1888: 
 1889:     %% init_table
 1890:     IF = fun(X) -> X end,
 1891:     check_badarg(catch dets:init_table(no_table, IF),
 1892:                  dets, init_table, [no_table,IF,[]]),
 1893:     check_badarg(catch dets:init_table(no_table, IF, []),
 1894:                  dets, init_table, [no_table,IF,[]]),
 1895: 
 1896:     %% from_ets
 1897:     Ets = ets:new(ets,[]),
 1898:     check_badarg(catch dets:from_ets(no_table, Ets),
 1899:                  dets, from_ets, [no_table,Ets]),
 1900:     ets:delete(Ets),
 1901: 
 1902:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(T, Args),
 1903:     {error,incompatible_arguments} =
 1904: 	dets:open_file(T, [{type,bag} | Args]),
 1905:     ok = dets:close(T),
 1906: 
 1907:     file:delete(Fname),
 1908:     check_pps(P0),
 1909:     ok.
 1910: 
 1911: %% Test the write cache for sets.
 1912: cache_sets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1913:     Small = 2,
 1914:     cache_sets(Config, {0,0}, false, Small),
 1915:     cache_sets(Config, {0,0}, true, Small),
 1916:     cache_sets(Config, {5000,5000}, false, Small),
 1917:     cache_sets(Config, {5000,5000}, true, Small),
 1918:     %% Objects of size greater than 2 kB.
 1919:     Big = 1200,
 1920:     cache_sets(Config, {0,0}, false, Big),
 1921:     cache_sets(Config, {0,0}, true, Big),
 1922:     cache_sets(Config, {5000,5000}, false, Big),
 1923:     cache_sets(Config, {5000,5000}, true, Big),
 1924:     ok.
 1925:     
 1926: cache_sets(Config, DelayedWrite, Extra, Sz) ->
 1927:     %% Extra = bool(). Insert tuples until the tested key is not alone.
 1928:     %% Sz = integer(). Size of the inserted tuples.
 1929: 
 1930:     T = cache,
 1931:     Fname = filename(cache, Config),
 1932:     file:delete(Fname),
 1933:     P0 = pps(),
 1934: 
 1935:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T,[{file,Fname}, {type,set},
 1936:                                 {delayed_write, DelayedWrite}]),
 1937: 
 1938:     Dups = 1,
 1939:     {Key, OtherKeys} = 
 1940: 	if 
 1941: 	    Extra ->
 1942: 		%% Insert enough to get three keys in some slot.
 1943: 		dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 1944: 		insert_objs(T, 1, Sz, Dups);
 1945: 	    true ->
 1946: 		{1,[]}
 1947: 	  end,
 1948:     Tuple = erlang:make_tuple(Sz, Key),
 1949:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 1950:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 1951: 
 1952:     %% The values of keys in the same slot as Key are checked.
 1953:     OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 1954:     
 1955:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tuple),
 1956:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 1957:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 1958:     ok = dets:insert(T, [Tuple,Tuple]),
 1959:     %% If no delay, the cache gets filled immediately, and written.
 1960:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup_keys(T, [Key,a,b,c,d,e,f]),
 1961:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 1962: 
 1963:     %% If delay, this happens without file access.
 1964:     ok = dets:delete(T,Key),
 1965:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 1966:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 1967:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 1968:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 1969:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 1970:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 1971:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 1972: 
 1973:     %% Key's objects are is on file only, 
 1974:     %% key 'toto' in the cache (if there is one).
 1975:     ok = dets:delete(T,toto),
 1976:     ok = dets:insert(T,[{toto,b},{toto,b}]),
 1977:     true = sort([Tuple,{toto,b}]) =:=
 1978:         sort(dets:lookup_keys(T, [Key,toto])),
 1979:     true = dets:member(T, toto),
 1980: 
 1981:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 1982:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 1983:     false = dets:member(T, Key),
 1984:     Size = dets:info(T, size),
 1985: 
 1986:     %% No object with the key on the file.
 1987:     %% Delete, add one object.
 1988:     Size1 = Size + 2,
 1989:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size1, Tuple, Key, 1),
 1990:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size1, Tuple, Key, 1),
 1991:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size1, Tuple, Key, 1),
 1992: 
 1993:     %% One object with the key on the file.
 1994:     %% Delete it, add one object.
 1995:     Size2 = Size + 2,
 1996:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size2, Tuple, Key, 1),
 1997:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size2, Tuple, Key, 1),
 1998:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size2, Tuple, Key, 1),
 1999: 
 2000:     %% Overwrite an old objekt with exactly the same size.
 2001:     Element = case element(2, Tuple) of
 2002: 		  255 -> 254;
 2003: 		  E -> E + 1
 2004: 	      end,
 2005:     Tuple2 = setelement(2, Tuple, Element),
 2006:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2007:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tuple2),
 2008:     [Tuple2] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2009:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2010:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2011:     [Tuple2] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2012:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2013: 
 2014:     ok = dets:insert(T, {3,a}),
 2015:     ok = dets:insert(T, {3,b}),
 2016:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {3,c}),
 2017:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {3,d}),
 2018:     [{3,b}] = dets:lookup(T, 3),
 2019: 
 2020:     ok = dets:delete(T, 3),
 2021:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {3,c}),
 2022:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {3,d}),
 2023:     [] = dets:lookup(T, 3),
 2024: 
 2025:     OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2026:     if
 2027: 	Extra ->
 2028: 	    %% Let the table grow a while, if it needs to.
 2029: 	    All1 = get_all_objects(T),
 2030: 	    dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 2031: 	    timer:sleep(1000),
 2032: 	    OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2033: 	    dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 2034: 	    All2 = get_all_objects(T),
 2035: 	    FAll2 = get_all_objects_fast(T),
 2036: 	    true = sort(All2) =:= sort(FAll2),
 2037:             case symdiff(All1, All2) of
 2038: 		{[],[]} ->  ok;
 2039: 		{X,Y} ->
 2040: 		    NoBad = length(X) + length(Y),
 2041: 		    ct:fail({sets,DelayedWrite,Extra,Sz,NoBad})
 2042: 	    end;
 2043: 	true ->
 2044: 	    ok
 2045:     end,
 2046:     ok = dets:close(T),
 2047: 
 2048:     file:delete(Fname),
 2049:     check_pps(P0),
 2050:     ok.
 2051:     
 2052: %% Test the write cache for bags.
 2053: cache_bags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2054:     Small = 2,
 2055:     cache_bags(Config, {0,0}, false, Small),
 2056:     cache_bags(Config, {0,0}, true, Small),
 2057:     cache_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, false, Small),
 2058:     cache_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, true, Small),
 2059:     %% Objects of size greater than 2 kB.
 2060:     Big = 1200,
 2061:     cache_bags(Config, {0,0}, false, Big),
 2062:     cache_bags(Config, {0,0}, true, Big),
 2063:     cache_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, false, Big),
 2064:     cache_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, true, Big),
 2065:     ok.
 2066:     
 2067: cache_bags(Config, DelayedWrite, Extra, Sz) ->
 2068:     %% Extra = bool(). Insert tuples until the tested key is not alone.
 2069:     %% Sz = integer(). Size of the inserted tuples.
 2070: 
 2071:     T = cache,
 2072:     Fname = filename(cache, Config),
 2073:     file:delete(Fname),
 2074:     P0 = pps(),
 2075: 
 2076:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T,[{file,Fname}, {type,bag},
 2077:                                 {delayed_write, DelayedWrite}]),
 2078: 
 2079:     Dups = 1,
 2080:     {Key, OtherKeys} = 
 2081: 	if 
 2082: 	    Extra ->
 2083: 		%% Insert enough to get three keys in some slot.
 2084: 		dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 2085: 		insert_objs(T, 1, Sz, Dups);
 2086: 	    true ->
 2087: 		{1,[]}
 2088: 	  end,
 2089:     Tuple = erlang:make_tuple(Sz, Key),
 2090:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 2091:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2092: 
 2093:     %% The values of keys in the same slot as Key are checked.
 2094:     OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2095:     
 2096:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tuple),
 2097:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2098:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2099:     ok = dets:insert(T, [Tuple,Tuple]),
 2100:     %% If no delay, the cache gets filled immediately, and written.
 2101:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup_keys(T, [Key,a,b,c,d,e,f]),
 2102:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2103: 
 2104:     %% If delay, this happens without file access. 
 2105:     %% (This is no longer true; cache lookup has been simplified.)
 2106:     ok = dets:delete(T,Key),
 2107:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 2108:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 2109:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2110:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2111:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2112:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2113:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2114: 
 2115:     %% Key's objects are is on file only, 
 2116:     %% key toto in the cache (if there is one).
 2117:     ok = dets:delete(T,toto),
 2118:     false = dets:member(T, toto),
 2119:     ok = dets:insert(T,[{toto,b},{toto,b}]),
 2120:     true = sort([Tuple,{toto,b}]) =:=
 2121:         sort(dets:lookup_keys(T, [Key,toto])),
 2122:     true = dets:member(T, toto),
 2123: 
 2124:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 2125:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2126:     Size = dets:info(T, size),
 2127: 
 2128:     %% No object with the key on the file.
 2129:     %% Delete, add one object.
 2130:     Size1 = Size + 2,
 2131:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size1, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2132:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size1, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2133:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size1, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2134: 
 2135:     %% One object with the key on the file.
 2136:     %% Delete it, add one object.
 2137:     Size2 = Size + 2,
 2138:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size2, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2139:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size2, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2140:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size2, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2141: 
 2142:     %% Overwrite an objekt on file with the same object.
 2143:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tuple),
 2144:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2145:     [Tuple2] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2146:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2147:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tuple),
 2148:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2149:     [Tuple2] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2150:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2151: 
 2152:     %% A mix of insert and delete.
 2153:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 2154:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2155:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 2156:     ok = dets:insert(T, {Key,foo}),
 2157:     ok = dets:insert(T, {Key,bar}),
 2158:     [{Key,bar},{Key,foo}] = sort(dets:lookup(T, Key)),
 2159:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2160:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {Key,foo}),
 2161:     ok = dets:insert(T, {Key,kar}),
 2162:     [{Key,bar},{Key,kar}] = sort(dets:lookup(T, Key)),
 2163:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2164:     ok = dets:insert(T, [{Key,kar},{Key,kar}]),
 2165:     [{Key,bar},{Key,kar}] = sort(dets:lookup(T, Key)),
 2166:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2167:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {Key,bar}),
 2168:     ok = dets:delete_object(T, {Key,kar}),
 2169:     [] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2170:     false = dets:member(T, Key),
 2171:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2172:     [] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2173:     false = dets:member(T, Key),
 2174: 
 2175:     OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2176:     if
 2177: 	Extra ->
 2178: 	    %% Let the table grow for a while, if it needs to.
 2179: 	    All1 = get_all_objects(T),
 2180: 	    dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 2181: 	    timer:sleep(1200),
 2182: 	    OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2183: 	    dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 2184: 	    All2 = get_all_objects(T),
 2185: 	    FAll2 = get_all_objects_fast(T),
 2186: 	    true = sort(All2) =:= sort(FAll2),
 2187:             case symdiff(All1, All2) of
 2188: 		{[],[]} ->  ok;
 2189: 		{X,Y} ->
 2190: 		    NoBad = length(X) + length(Y),
 2191: 		    ct:fail({bags,DelayedWrite,Extra,Sz,NoBad})
 2192: 	    end;
 2193: 	true ->
 2194: 	    ok
 2195:     end,
 2196:     ok = dets:close(T),
 2197:     file:delete(Fname),
 2198: 
 2199:     %% Second object of a key added and looked up simultaneously.
 2200:     R1 = {index_test,1,2,3,4},
 2201:     R2 = {index_test,2,2,13,14},
 2202:     R3 = {index_test,1,12,13,14},
 2203:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T,[{type,bag}, {keypos,2},{file,Fname}]),
 2204:     ok = dets:insert(T,R1),
 2205:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2206:     ok = dets:insert(T,R2),
 2207:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2208:     ok = dets:insert(T,R3),
 2209:     [R1,R3] = sort(dets:lookup(T,1)),
 2210:     true = dets:member(T, 1),
 2211:     [R1,R3] = sort(dets:lookup(T,1)),
 2212:     true = dets:member(T, 1),
 2213:     ok = dets:close(T),
 2214:     file:delete(Fname),
 2215: 
 2216:     check_pps(P0),
 2217:     ok.
 2218:     
 2219: %% Test the write cache for duplicate bags.
 2220: cache_duplicate_bags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2221:     Small = 2,
 2222:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {0,0}, false, Small),
 2223:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {0,0}, true, Small),
 2224:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, false, Small),
 2225:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, true, Small),
 2226:     %% Objects of size greater than 2 kB.
 2227:     Big = 1200,
 2228:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {0,0}, false, Big),
 2229:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {0,0}, true, Big),
 2230:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, false, Big),
 2231:     cache_dup_bags(Config, {5000,5000}, true, Big).
 2232: 
 2233: cache_dup_bags(Config, DelayedWrite, Extra, Sz) ->
 2234:     %% Extra = bool(). Insert tuples until the tested key is not alone.
 2235:     %% Sz = integer(). Size of the inserted tuples.
 2236: 
 2237:     T = cache,
 2238:     Fname = filename(cache, Config),
 2239:     file:delete(Fname),
 2240:     P0 = pps(),
 2241: 
 2242:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(T,[{file,Fname}, {type,duplicate_bag},
 2243:                                 {delayed_write, DelayedWrite}]),
 2244: 
 2245:     Dups = 2,
 2246:     {Key, OtherKeys} = 
 2247: 	if 
 2248: 	    Extra ->
 2249: 		%% Insert enough to get three keys in some slot.
 2250: 		dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 2251: 		insert_objs(T, 1, Sz, Dups);
 2252: 	    true ->
 2253: 		{1,[]}
 2254: 	  end,
 2255:     Tuple = erlang:make_tuple(Sz, Key),
 2256:     ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 2257:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2258:     false = dets:member(T, Key),
 2259: 
 2260:     %% The values of keys in the same slot as Key are checked.
 2261:     OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2262:     
 2263:     ok = dets:insert(T, Tuple),
 2264:     [Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2265:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2266:     ok = dets:insert(T, [Tuple,Tuple]),
 2267:     %% If no delay, the cache gets filled immediately, and written.
 2268:     [Tuple,Tuple,Tuple] = dets:lookup_keys(T, [Key,a,b,c,d,e,f]),
 2269:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2270: 
 2271:     %% If delay, this happens without file access.
 2272:     %% (This is no longer true; cache lookup has been simplified.)
 2273:     ok = dets:delete(T,Key),
 2274:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 2275:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 2276:     [Tuple,Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2277:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2278:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2279:     [Tuple,Tuple] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2280:     true = dets:member(T, Key),
 2281: 
 2282:     %% One object in the cache, one on the file.
 2283:     ok = dets:delete(T,Key),
 2284:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 2285:     ok = dets:sync(T),
 2286:     ok = dets:insert(T,Tuple),
 2287:     true = dets:member(T, Key), % should not read the file, but it does..
 2288: 
 2289:     %% Key's objects are is on file only, 
 2290:     %% key toto in the cache (if there is one).
 2291:     ok = dets:delete(T,toto),
 2292:     ok = dets:insert(T,[{toto,b},{toto,b}]),
 2293:     true = sort([Tuple,Tuple,{toto,b},{toto,b}]) =:=
 2294:                  sort(dets:lookup_keys(T, [Key,toto])),
 2295:     true = dets:member(T, toto),
 2296:     Size = dets:info(T, size),
 2297: 
 2298:     %% Two objects with the same key on the file.
 2299:     %% Delete them, add two objects.
 2300:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 2),
 2301: 
 2302:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 2),
 2303:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 2),
 2304: 
 2305:     %% Two objects with the same key on the file.
 2306:     %% Delete them, add three objects.
 2307:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 3),
 2308:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 3),
 2309:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 3),
 2310: 
 2311:     %% Two objects with the same key on the file.
 2312:     %% Delete them, add one object.
 2313:     del_and_ins(key, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2314:     del_and_ins(object, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2315:     del_and_ins(both, T, Size, Tuple, Key, 1),
 2316: 
 2317:     OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2318:     if
 2319: 	Extra ->
 2320: 	    %% Let the table grow for a while, if it needs to.
 2321: 	    All1 = get_all_objects(T),
 2322: 	    dets:safe_fixtable(T, false),
 2323: 	    timer:sleep(1200),
 2324: 	    OtherValues = sort(lookup_keys(T, OtherKeys)),
 2325: 	    dets:safe_fixtable(T, true),
 2326: 	    All2 = get_all_objects(T),
 2327: 	    FAll2 = get_all_objects_fast(T),
 2328: 	    true = sort(All2) =:= sort(FAll2),
 2329:             case symdiff(All1, All2) of
 2330: 		{[],[]} ->  ok;
 2331: 		{X,Y} ->
 2332: 		    NoBad = length(X) + length(Y),
 2333: 		    ct:fail({dup_bags,DelayedWrite,Extra,Sz,NoBad})
 2334: 	    end;
 2335: 	true ->
 2336: 	    ok
 2337:     end,
 2338:     ok = dets:close(T),
 2339: 
 2340:     file:delete(Fname),
 2341:     check_pps(P0),
 2342:     ok.
 2343:     
 2344: lookup_keys(_T, []) ->
 2345:     [];
 2346: lookup_keys(T, Keys) ->
 2347:     dets:lookup_keys(T, Keys).
 2348: 
 2349: del_and_ins(W, T, Size, Obj, Key, N) ->
 2350:     case W of
 2351: 	object -> 
 2352: 	    ok = dets:delete_object(T, Obj);
 2353: 	key ->
 2354: 
 2355: 	    ok = dets:delete(T, Key);
 2356: 	both ->
 2357: 	    ok = dets:delete(T, Key),
 2358: 	    ok = dets:delete_object(T, Obj)
 2359:     end,
 2360:     Objs = duplicate(N, Obj),
 2361:     [] = dets:lookup(T, Key),
 2362:     ok = dets:insert(T, Objs),
 2363:     Objs = dets:lookup_keys(T, [snurrespratt,Key]),
 2364:     true = Size + length(Objs)-2 =:= dets:info(T, size),
 2365:     Objs = dets:lookup(T, Key).
 2366: 
 2367: 
 2368: insert_objs(T, N, Sz, Dups) ->
 2369:     Seq = seq(N,N+255),
 2370:     L0 = map(fun(I) -> erlang:make_tuple(Sz, I) end, Seq),
 2371:     L = append(duplicate(Dups, L0)),
 2372:     ok = dets:insert(T, L),
 2373:     case search_slot(T, 0) of
 2374:         false ->
 2375:             insert_objs(T, N+256, Sz, Dups);
 2376:         Keys ->
 2377:             Keys
 2378:     end.
 2379: 
 2380: search_slot(T, I) ->
 2381:     case dets:slot(T, I) of
 2382:         '$end_of_table' ->
 2383:             false;
 2384:         Objs ->
 2385:             case usort(map(fun(X) -> element(1, X) end, Objs)) of
 2386:                 [_, Key, _ | _] = Keys0 ->
 2387:                     Keys = delete(Key, Keys0),
 2388:                     {Key, Keys};
 2389:                 _ ->
 2390:                     search_slot(T, I+1)
 2391:             end
 2392:     end.
 2393: 
 2394: symdiff(L1, L2) ->
 2395:     {X, _, Y} = 
 2396: 	sofs:symmetric_partition(sofs:set(L1), sofs:set(L2)),
 2397:     {sofs:to_external(X), sofs:to_external(Y)}.
 2398: 
 2399: %% Test read-only tables and traversal caused crashes.
 2400: otp_4208(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2401:     Tab = otp_4208,
 2402:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 2403:     Expected = sort([{3,ghi,12},{1,abc,10},{4,jkl,13},{2,def,11}]),
 2404: 
 2405:     file:delete(FName),
 2406:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,FName}]),
 2407:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{1,abc,10},{2,def,11},{3,ghi,12},{4,jkl,13}]),
 2408:     Expected = sort(dets:traverse(Tab, fun(X) -> {continue, X} end)),
 2409:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2410: 
 2411:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{access, read},{file,FName}]),
 2412:     Expected = sort(dets:traverse(Tab, fun(X) -> {continue, X} end)),
 2413:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2414:     file:delete(FName),
 2415:     
 2416:     ok.
 2417: 
 2418: %% Test read-only tables and growth.
 2419: otp_4989(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2420:     Tab = otp_4989,
 2421:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 2422: 
 2423:     %% Do exactly as in the error report.
 2424:     _Ets = ets:new(Tab, [named_table]),
 2425:     ets_init(Tab, 100000),
 2426:     {ok, Tab} =
 2427:         dets:open_file(Tab, [{access, read_write}, {file,FName}, {keypos,2}]),
 2428:     ok = dets:from_ets(Tab, Tab),
 2429:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2430:     %% Restore.
 2431:      {ok, Tab} =
 2432:         dets:open_file(Tab, [{access, read}, {keypos, 2}, {file, FName}]),
 2433:     true = ets:delete_all_objects(Tab),
 2434:     true = ets:from_dets(Tab, Tab),
 2435:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2436:     ets:delete(Tab),
 2437:     file:delete(FName),
 2438:     ok.
 2439: 
 2440: ets_init(_Tab, 0) ->
 2441:     ok;
 2442: ets_init(Tab, N) ->
 2443:     ets:insert(Tab, {N,N}),
 2444:     ets_init(Tab, N - 1).
 2445: 
 2446: %% OTP-8898. Truncated Dets file.

 2448:     Tab = otp_8898,
 2449:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 2450: 
 2451:     Server = self(),
 2452: 
 2453:     file:delete(FName),
 2454:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
 2455:     [P1,P2,P3] = new_clients(3, Tab),
 2456: 
 2457:     Seq = [{P1,[sync]},{P2,[{lookup,1,[]}]},{P3,[{insert,{1,b}}]}],
 2458:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[]], Seq),
 2459:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok},{P2,ok},{P3,ok}]),
 2460:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2461:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),

 2466: %% OTP-8899. Several clients. Updated Head was ignored.
 2467: otp_8899(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2468:     Tab = many_clients,
 2469:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 2470: 
 2471:     Server = self(),
 2472: 
 2473:     file:delete(FName),
 2474:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
 2475:     [P1,P2,P3,P4] = new_clients(4, Tab),
 2476: 
 2477:     MC = [Tab],
 2478:     Seq6a = [{P1,[{insert,[{used_to_be_skipped_by,match}]},
 2479:                   {lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]},
 2480:              {P2,[{verbose,true,MC}]},
 2481:              {P3,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]}, {P4,[{verbose,true,MC}]}],
 2482:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]], Seq6a),
 2483:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2484:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{used_to_be_skipped_by,match}] =
 2485:         lists:sort(dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 2486:     _ = dets:close(Tab),

 2490: 
 2491: %% Test several clients accessing a table simultaneously.
 2492: many_clients(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2493:     Tab = many_clients,
 2494:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 2495: 
 2496:     Server = self(),
 2497: 
 2498:     file:delete(FName),
 2499:     P0 = pps(),
 2500:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
 2501:     [P1,P2,P3,P4] = new_clients(4, Tab),
 2502: 
 2503:     %% dets:init_table/2 is used for making sure that all processes
 2504:     %% start sending requests before the Dets process begins to handle
 2505:     %% them; the requests arrive "in parallel".
 2506: 
 2507:     %% Four processes accessing the same table at almost the same time.
 2508: 
 2509:     %% One key is read, updated, and read again.
 2510:     Seq1 = [{P1,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]}, {P2,[{insert,{1,b}}]},
 2511: 	    {P3,[{lookup,1,[{1,b}]}]}, {P4,[{lookup,1,[{1,b}]}]}],
 2512:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{1,a}]], Seq1),
 2513:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2514: 
 2515:     %% Different keys read by different processes
 2516:     Seq2 = [{P1,[{member,1,true}]}, {P2,[{lookup,2,[{2,b}]}]},
 2517: 	    {P3,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]}, {P4,[{lookup,3,[{3,c}]}]}],
 2518:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]], Seq2),
 2519:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2520: 
 2521:     %% Reading deleted key.
 2522:     Seq3 = [{P1,[{delete_key,2}]}, {P2,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]},
 2523: 	    {P3,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]}, {P4,[{member,2,false}]}],
 2524:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]], Seq3),
 2525:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2526: 
 2527:     %% Inserting objects.
 2528:     Seq4 = [{P1,[{insert,[{1,a},{2,b}]}]}, {P2,[{insert,[{2,c},{3,a}]}]},
 2529: 	    {P3,[{insert,[{3,b},{4,d}]}]},
 2530: 	    {P4,[{lookup_keys,[1,2,3,4],[{1,a},{2,c},{3,b},{4,d}]}]}],
 2531:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [], Seq4),
 2532:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2533: 
 2534:     %% Deleting objects.
 2535:     Seq5 = [{P1,[{delete_object,{1,a}}]}, {P2,[{delete_object,{1,a}}]},
 2536: 	    {P3,[{delete_object,{3,c}}]},
 2537: 	    {P4,[{lookup_keys,[1,2,3,4],[{2,b}]}]}],
 2538:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]], Seq5),
 2539:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2540: 
 2541:     %% Some request not streamed.
 2542:     Seq6 = [{P1,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]}, {P2,[{info,size,3}]},
 2543: 	    {P3,[{lookup,1,[{1,a}]}]}, {P4,[{info,size,3}]}],
 2544:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]], Seq6),
 2545:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2546: 
 2547:     %% Some request not streamed.
 2548:     Seq7 = [{P1,[{insert,[{3,a}]}]}, {P2,[{insert,[{3,b}]}]},
 2549: 	    {P3,[{delete_object,{3,c}}]},
 2550: 	    {P4,[{lookup,3,[{3,b}]}]}],
 2551:     atomic_requests(Server, Tab, [[{3,c}]], Seq7),
 2552:     true = get_replies([{P1,ok}, {P2,ok}, {P3,ok}, {P4,ok}]),
 2553: 
 2554:     put_requests(Server, [{P1,stop},{P2,stop},{P3,stop},{P4,stop}]),
 2555:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2556:     file:delete(FName),
 2557: 
 2558:     %% Check that errors are handled correctly by the streaming operators.
 2559:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
 2560:     ok = ins(Tab, 100),
 2561:     Obj = {66,{item,number,66}},
 2562:     {ok, ObjPos} = dets:where(Tab, Obj),
 2563:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2564:     %% Damaged object.
 2565:     crash(FName, ObjPos+12),
 2566:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
 2567:     BadObject1 = dets:lookup_keys(Tab, [65,66,67,68,69]),
 2568:     bad_object(BadObject1, FName),
 2569:     _Error = dets:close(Tab),
 2570:     file:delete(FName),
 2571: 
 2572:     check_pps(P0),
 2573: 
 2574:     ok.
 2575: 
 2576: %% Tab is initiated with the objects in Objs. Objs = [[object()]].
 2577: atomic_requests(Server, Tab, Objs, Req) ->
 2578:     ok = dets:init_table(Tab, atomic_requests(Server, Objs, Req)).
 2579: 
 2580: atomic_requests(Server, L, Req) ->
 2581:     fun(close) ->
 2582: 	    ok;
 2583:        (read) when [] =:= L ->
 2584: 	    put_requests(Server, Req),
 2585: 	    end_of_input;
 2586:        (read) ->
 2587: 	    [E | Es] = L,
 2588: 	    {E, atomic_requests(Server, Es, Req)}
 2589:     end.
 2590: 
 2591: put_requests(Server, L) ->
 2592:     lists:foreach(fun({Pid,R}) -> Pid ! {Server,R}, timer:sleep(1) end, L).
 2593: 
 2594: get_replies(L) ->
 2595:     lists:all(fun({Pid,Reply}) -> Reply =:= get_reply(Pid) end, L).
 2596: 
 2597: get_reply(Pid) ->
 2598:     receive {Pid, Reply} -> Reply end.
 2599: 
 2600: new_clients(0, _Tab) ->
 2601:     [];
 2602: new_clients(N, Tab) ->
 2603:     [new_client(Tab) | new_clients(N-1, Tab)].
 2604: 
 2605: new_client(Tab) ->
 2606:     spawn(?MODULE, client, [self(), Tab]).
 2607: 
 2608: client(S, Tab) ->
 2609:     receive 
 2610: 	{S, stop} ->
 2611: 	    exit(normal);
 2612: 	{S, ToDo} ->
 2613: 	    Reply = eval(ToDo, Tab),
 2614: 	    case Reply of
 2615: 		{error, _} -> io:format("~p: ~p~n", [self(), Reply]);
 2616: 		_ -> ok
 2617: 	    end,
 2618: 	    S ! {self(), Reply}
 2619:     end,
 2620:     client(S, Tab).
 2621: 
 2622: eval([], _Tab) ->
 2623:     ok;
 2624: eval([{verbose,Bool,Expected} | L], Tab) ->
 2625:     case dets:verbose(Bool) of
 2626:         Expected -> eval(L, Tab);
 2627:         Error -> {error, {verbose,Error}}
 2628:     end;
 2629: eval([sync | L], Tab) ->
 2630:     case dets:sync(Tab) of
 2631:         ok -> eval(L, Tab);
 2632:         Error -> {error, {sync,Error}}
 2633:     end;
 2634: eval([{insert,Stuff} | L], Tab) ->
 2635:     case dets:insert(Tab, Stuff) of
 2636:         ok -> eval(L, Tab);
 2637:         Error -> {error, {insert,Stuff,Error}}
 2638:     end;
 2639: eval([{lookup,Key,Expected} | L], Tab) ->
 2640:     case dets:lookup(Tab, Key) of
 2641:         Expected -> eval(L, Tab);
 2642:         Else -> {error, {lookup,Key,Expected,Else}}
 2643:     end;
 2644: eval([{lookup_keys,Keys,Expected} | L], Tab) ->
 2645:     %% Time order is destroyed...
 2646:     case dets:lookup_keys(Tab, Keys) of
 2647:         R when is_list(R) ->
 2648:             case lists:sort(Expected) =:= lists:sort(R) of
 2649:                 true -> eval(L, Tab);
 2650:                 false -> {error, {lookup_keys,Keys,Expected,R}}
 2651:             end;
 2652:         Else -> {error, {lookup_keys,Keys,Expected,Else}}
 2653:     end;
 2654: eval([{member,Key,Expected} | L], Tab) ->
 2655:     case dets:member(Tab, Key) of
 2656:         Expected -> eval(L, Tab);
 2657:         Else -> {error, {member,Key,Expected,Else}}
 2658:     end;
 2659: eval([{delete_key,Key} | L], Tab) ->
 2660:     case dets:delete(Tab, Key) of
 2661:         ok -> eval(L, Tab);
 2662:         Else -> {error, {delete_key,Key,Else}}
 2663:     end;
 2664: eval([{delete_object,Object} | L], Tab) ->
 2665:     case dets:delete_object(Tab, Object) of
 2666:         ok -> eval(L, Tab);
 2667:         Else -> {error, {delete_object,Object,Else}}
 2668:     end;
 2669: eval([{info,Tag,Expected} | L], Tab) ->
 2670:     case dets:info(Tab, Tag) of
 2671:         Expected -> eval(L, Tab);
 2672:         Else -> {error, {info,Tag,Else,Expected}}
 2673:     end;
 2674: eval(Else, _Tab) ->
 2675:     {error, {bad_request,Else}}.
 2676: 
 2677: %% More than 128k keys caused crash.
 2678: otp_4906(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2679:     N = 256*512 + 400,
 2680:     Tab = otp_4906,
 2681:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 2682:     
 2683:     file:delete(FName),
 2684:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, FName}]),
 2685:     ok = ins_small(Tab, 0, N),
 2686:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2687:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, FName}]),
 2688:     ok = read_4906(Tab, N-1),
 2689:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2690:     file:delete(FName),
 2691: 
 2692:     %% If the (only) process fixing a table updates the table, the
 2693:     %% process will no longer be punished with a 1 ms delay (hm, the
 2694:     %% server is delayed, it should be the client...). In this example
 2695:     %% the writing process *is* delayed.
 2696:     {ok,Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,FName}]),
 2697:     Parent = self(),
 2698:     FixPid = spawn_link(fun() -> 
 2699:                                 dets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 2700:                                 receive {Parent, stop} -> ok end
 2701:                         end),
 2702:     ok = ins_small(Tab, 0, 1000),
 2703:     FixPid ! {Parent, stop},
 2704:     timer:sleep(1),
 2705:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2706:     file:delete(FName),
 2707:     ok.
 2708: 
 2709: read_4906(_T, N) when N < 0 ->
 2710:     ok;
 2711: read_4906(T, N) ->
 2712:     [_] = dets:lookup(T, N),
 2713:     read_4906(T, N-1).
 2714: 
 2715: ins_small(_T, I, N) when I =:= N ->
 2716:     ok;
 2717: ins_small(T, I, N) ->
 2718:     ok = dets:insert(T, {I}),
 2719:     ins_small(T, I+1, N).
 2720: 
 2721: %% Unwritable ramfile caused crash.
 2722: otp_5402(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2723:     Tab = otp_5402,
 2724:     File = filename:join(["cannot", "write", "this", "file"]),
 2725: 
 2726:     %% close
 2727:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{ram_file,true},
 2728:                                    {file, File}]),
 2729:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1,a}),
 2730:     {error,{file_error,_,_}} = dets:close(T),
 2731: 
 2732:     %% sync
 2733:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{ram_file,true},
 2734:                                    {file, File}]),
 2735:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1,a}),
 2736:     {error,{file_error,_,_}} = dets:sync(T),
 2737:     {error,{file_error,_,_}} = dets:close(T),
 2738: 
 2739:     %% auto_save
 2740:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{ram_file,true},
 2741:                                    {auto_save, 2000},
 2742:                                    {file, File}]),
 2743:     ok = dets:insert(T, {1,a}),
 2744:     timer:sleep(5000),
 2745:     {error,{file_error,_,_}} = dets:close(T),
 2746:     ok.
 2747: 
 2748: %% Several clients open and close tables simultaneously.
 2749: simultaneous_open(Config) ->
 2750:     Tab = sim_open,
 2751:     File = filename(Tab, Config),
 2752:     
 2753:     ok = monit(Tab, File),
 2754:     case feasible() of
 2755:         false -> {comment, "OK, but did not run all of the test"};
 2756:         true ->
 2757:             ok = kill_while_repairing(Tab, File),
 2758:             ok = kill_while_init(Tab, File),
 2759:             ok = open_ro(Tab, File),
 2760:             ok = open_w(Tab, File, 0, Config),
 2761:             ok = open_w(Tab, File, 100, Config)
 2762:     end.
 2763: 
 2764: feasible() ->
 2765:     LP = erlang:system_info(logical_processors),
 2766:     (is_integer(LP)
 2767:      andalso LP >= erlang:system_info(schedulers_online)
 2768:      andalso not erlang:system_info(debug_compiled)
 2769:      andalso not erlang:system_info(lock_checking)).
 2770: 
 2771: %% One process logs and another process closes the log. Before
 2772: %% monitors were used, this would make the client never return.
 2773: monit(Tab, File) ->
 2774:     file:delete(File),
 2775:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 2776:     F1 = fun() -> dets:close(Tab) end,
 2777:     F2 = fun() -> {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = do_log(Tab) end,
 2778:     spawn(F2),
 2779:     timer:sleep(100),
 2780:     spawn(F1),
 2781:     dets:close(Tab),
 2782:     ok = file:delete(File).
 2783: 
 2784: do_log(Tab) ->
 2785:     case catch dets:insert(Tab, {hej,san,sa}) of
 2786:         ok -> do_log(Tab);
 2787:         Else -> Else
 2788:     end.
 2789: 
 2790: %% Kill the Dets process while repair is in progress.
 2791: kill_while_repairing(Tab, File) ->
 2792:     create_opened_log(File),
 2793:     Delay = 1000,
 2794:     dets:start(),
 2795:     Parent = self(),
 2796:     F = fun() -> 
 2797:                 R = (catch dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}])),
 2798:                 timer:sleep(Delay),
 2799:                 Parent ! {self(), R}
 2800:         end,
 2801:     %% One of these will open the file, the other will be pending
 2802:     %% until the file has been repaired:
 2803:     P1 = spawn(F),
 2804:     P2 = spawn(F),
 2805:     P3 = spawn(F),
 2806:     DetsPid = find_dets_pid(),
 2807:     exit(DetsPid, kill),
 2808: 
 2809:     receive {P1,R1} -> R1 end,
 2810:     receive {P2,R2} -> R2 end,
 2811:     receive {P3,R3} -> R3 end,
 2812:     io:format("Killed pid: ~p~n", [DetsPid]),
 2813:     io:format("Remaining Dets-pids (should be nil): ~p~n",
 2814:               [find_dets_pids()]),
 2815:     {replies,[{'EXIT', {dets_process_died, _}}, {ok,_}, {ok, _}]} =
 2816:          {replies,lists:sort([R1, R2, R3])},
 2817: 
 2818:     timer:sleep(200),
 2819:     case dets:info(Tab) of
 2820:         undefined -> 
 2821:             ok;
 2822:         _Info ->
 2823:             timer:sleep(5000),
 2824:             undefined = dets:info(Tab)
 2825:     end,
 2826: 
 2827:     file:delete(File),
 2828:     ok.
 2829: 
 2830: find_dets_pid() ->
 2831:     case find_dets_pids() of
 2832:         [] ->
 2833:             timer:sleep(100),
 2834:             find_dets_pid();
 2835:         [Pid] ->
 2836:             Pid
 2837:     end.
 2838: 
 2839: find_dets_pids() ->
 2840:     lists:filter(fun(P) -> dets:pid2name(P) =/= undefined end,
 2841:                  erlang:processes()).
 2842: 
 2843: %% Kill the Dets process when there are users and an on-going
 2844: %% initiailization.
 2845: kill_while_init(Tab, File) ->
 2846:     file:delete(File),
 2847:     Parent = self(),
 2848:     F = fun() -> 
 2849:                 R = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 2850:                 Parent ! {self(), R},
 2851:                 receive {Parent, die} -> ok end,
 2852:                 {error, not_owner} = dets:close(Tab)
 2853:         end,
 2854:     P1 = spawn(F),
 2855:     P2 = spawn(F),
 2856:     P3 = spawn(F),
 2857:     IF = fun() ->
 2858:                  R = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 2859:                  Parent ! {self(), R},
 2860:                  Fun = fun(_) -> timer:sleep(100000) end,
 2861:                  {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:init_table(Tab, Fun)),
 2862:                  receive {Parent, die} -> ok end
 2863:           end,
 2864:     P4 = spawn(IF),
 2865:     receive {P1,R1} -> {ok, _} = R1 end,
 2866:     receive {P2,R2} -> {ok, _} = R2 end,
 2867:     receive {P3,R3} -> {ok, _} = R3 end,
 2868:     receive {P4,R4} -> {ok, _} = R4 end,
 2869:     DetsPid = find_dets_pid(),
 2870:     exit(DetsPid, kill),
 2871:     
 2872:     timer:sleep(1000),
 2873:     undefined = dets:info(Tab),
 2874:     P1 ! {Parent, die},
 2875:     P2 ! {Parent, die},
 2876:     P3 ! {Parent, die},
 2877:     P4 ! {Parent, die},
 2878: 
 2879:     file:delete(File),
 2880:     timer:sleep(100),
 2881:     ok.
 2882: 
 2883: open_ro(Tab, File) ->
 2884:     create_opened_log(File),
 2885:     Delay = 1000,
 2886:     Parent = self(),
 2887:     F = fun() ->
 2888:                 R = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File},{access,read}]),
 2889:                 timer:sleep(Delay),
 2890:                 Parent ! {self(), R}
 2891:         end,
 2892:     P1 = spawn(F),
 2893:     P2 = spawn(F),
 2894:     P3 = spawn(F),
 2895:     
 2896:     receive {P1,R1} -> {error,{not_closed,_}} = R1 end,
 2897:     receive {P2,R2} -> {error,{not_closed,_}} = R2 end,
 2898:     receive {P3,R3} -> {error,{not_closed,_}} = R3 end,
 2899:     ok.
 2900: 
 2901: open_w(Tab, File, Delay, Config) ->
 2902:     create_opened_log(File),
 2903: 
 2904:     Tab2 = t2,
 2905:     File2 = filename(Tab2, Config),
 2906:     file:delete(File2),
 2907:     {ok,Tab2} = dets:open_file(Tab2, [{file,File2}]),
 2908:     ok = dets:close(Tab2),
 2909: 
 2910:     Parent = self(),
 2911:     F = fun() -> 
 2912:                 R = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 2913:                 timer:sleep(Delay),
 2914:                 Parent ! {self(), R}
 2915:         end,
 2916:     Pid1 = spawn(F),
 2917:     Pid2 = spawn(F),
 2918:     Pid3 = spawn(F),
 2919: 
 2920:     ok = wait_for_repair_to_start(Tab),
 2921: 
 2922:     %% It is assumed that it takes some time to repair the file.
 2923:     {ok,Tab2} = dets:open_file(Tab2, [{file,File2}]),
 2924:     %% The Dets server managed to handle to open_file request.
 2925:     0 = qlen(), % still repairing
 2926: 
 2927:     ok = dets:close(Tab2),
 2928:     file:delete(File2),
 2929: 
 2930:     receive {Pid1,R1} -> {ok, Tab} = R1 end,
 2931:     receive {Pid2,R2} -> {ok, Tab} = R2 end,
 2932:     receive {Pid3,R3} -> {ok, Tab} = R3 end,
 2933:     timer:sleep(200),
 2934:     case dets:info(Tab) of
 2935:         undefined -> 
 2936:             ok;
 2937:         _Info ->
 2938:             timer:sleep(5000),
 2939:             undefined = dets:info(Tab)
 2940:     end,
 2941: 
 2942:     file:delete(File),
 2943:     ok.
 2944: 
 2945: wait_for_repair_to_start(Tab) ->
 2946:     case catch dets_server:get_pid(Tab) of
 2947:         {'EXIT', _} ->
 2948:             timer:sleep(1),
 2949:             wait_for_repair_to_start(Tab);
 2950:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2951:             ok
 2952:     end.
 2953: 
 2954: qlen() ->
 2955:     {_, {_, N}} = lists:keysearch(message_queue_len, 1, process_info(self())),
 2956:     N.
 2957: 
 2958: create_opened_log(File) ->
 2959:     Tab = t,
 2960:     file:delete(File),
 2961:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 2962:     ok = ins(Tab, 60000),
 2963:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2964:     crash(File, ?CLOSED_PROPERLY_POS+3, ?NOT_PROPERLY_CLOSED),
 2965:     ok.
 2966: 
 2967: %% OTP-5075. insert_new/2
 2968: insert_new(Config) ->
 2969:     Tab = insert_new,
 2970:     File = filename(Tab, Config),
 2971:     file:delete(File),
 2972:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 2973:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:insert_new(Tab, 14)),
 2974:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:insert_new(Tab, {})),
 2975:     true = dets:insert_new(Tab, {1,a}),
 2976:     false = dets:insert_new(Tab, {1,a}),
 2977:     true = dets:insert_new(Tab, [{2,b}, {3,c}]),
 2978:     false = dets:insert_new(Tab, [{2,b}, {3,c}]),
 2979:     false = dets:insert_new(Tab, [{1,a}, {4,d}]),
 2980:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2981: 
 2982:     file:delete(File),    
 2983:     {ok, T} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File},{type,bag}]),
 2984:     true = dets:insert_new(Tab, {1,a}),
 2985:     false = dets:insert_new(Tab, {1,b}),
 2986:     true = dets:insert_new(Tab, [{2,b}, {3,c}]),
 2987:     false = dets:insert_new(Tab, [{2,a}, {3,d}]),
 2988:     false = dets:insert_new(Tab, [{1,a}, {4,d}]),
 2989:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 2990:     
 2991: 
 2992:     file:delete(File),
 2993:     ok.
 2994:     
 2995: %% OTP-5126. repair_continuation/2
 2996: repair_continuation(Config) ->
 2997:     Tab = repair_continuation_table,
 2998:     Fname = filename(repair_cont, Config),
 2999:     file:delete(Fname),
 3000:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,Fname}]),
 3001:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 3002: 
 3003:     MS = [{'_',[],[true]}],
 3004: 
 3005:     SRes = term_to_binary(dets:select(Tab, MS, 1)),
 3006:     %% Get rid of compiled match spec
 3007:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 3008:                           garbage_collect(P)
 3009:                   end, processes()),
 3010:     {[true], C2} = binary_to_term(SRes),
 3011: 
 3012:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:select(C2)),
 3013:     C3 = dets:repair_continuation(C2, MS),
 3014:     {[true], C4} = dets:select(C3),
 3015:     C5 = dets:repair_continuation(C4, MS),
 3016:     {[true], _} = dets:select(C5),
 3017:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch dets:repair_continuation(Tab, bu)),
 3018: 
 3019:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3020:     file:delete(Fname),
 3021:     ok.

 3164: otp_4738_set(Config) ->

 3169:

 3172:     F = float(I),
 3173:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, Args),
 3174:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{I},{F}]),
 3175:     ok = dets:sync(Tab),
 3176:     [{F}] = dets:lookup(Tab, F),
 3177:     [{I}] = dets:lookup(Tab, I),
 3178:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{F}]),
 3179:     [{I},{F}] = dets_utils:mkeysort(1, dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 3180:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3181:     file:delete(File),
 3182:

 3184:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{I}]),
 3185:     ok = dets:sync(Tab),
 3186:     [] = dets:lookup(Tab, F),
 3187:     [{I}] = dets:lookup(Tab, I),
 3188:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{F}]),
 3189:     [{I},{F}] = dets_utils:mkeysort(1, dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 3190:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3191:     file:delete(File),
 3192: 
 3193:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, Args),
 3194:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{I},{F}]),
 3195:     %% {insert, ...} in the cache, try lookup:
 3196:     [{F}] = dets:lookup(Tab, F),
 3197:     [{I}] = dets:lookup(Tab, I),
 3198:     %% Both were found, but that cannot be verified.
 3199:     [{I},{F}] = dets_utils:mkeysort(1, dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 3200:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3201:     file:delete(File),
 3202: 
 3203:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, Args),
 3204:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{I}]),
 3205:     ok = dets:sync(Tab),
 3206:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{F}]),
 3207:     %% {insert, ...} in the cache, try lookup:
 3208:     [{F}] = dets:lookup(Tab, F),
 3209:     [{I}] = dets:lookup(Tab, I),
 3210:     [{I},{F}] = dets_utils:mkeysort(1, dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 3211:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3212:     file:delete(File),
 3213: 
 3214:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, Args),
 3215:     %% Both operations in the cache:
 3216:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{I}]),
 3217:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{F}]),
 3218:     [{I},{F}] = dets_utils:mkeysort(1, dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 3219:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3220:     file:delete(File),
 3221:     ok.

 3331: %% OTP-9282. The name of a table can be an arbitrary term.
 3332: otp_9282(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3333:     some_calls(make_ref(), Config),
 3334:     some_calls({a,typical,name}, Config),
 3335:     some_calls(fun() -> a_funny_name end, Config),
 3336:     ok.
 3337: 
 3338: some_calls(Tab, Config) ->
 3339:     File = filename(ref, Config),
 3340:     {ok,T} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 3341:     T = Tab,
 3342:     false = dets:info(T, safe_fixed),
 3343:     File = dets:info(T, filename),
 3344:     ok = dets:insert(Tab, [{3,0}]),
 3345:     [{3,0}] = dets:lookup(Tab, 3),
 3346:     [{3,0}] = dets:traverse(Tab, fun(X) -> {continue, X} end),
 3347:     ok = dets:close(T),
 3348:     file:delete(File).
 3349: 
 3350: 
 3351: %% OTP-11245. Tables remained fixed after traversal.
 3352: otp_11245(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3353:     Tab = otp_11245,
 3354:     File = filename(Tab, Config),
 3355:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file,File}]),
 3356:     N = 1024,
 3357:     ins(Tab, N),
 3358:     N = length(dets:match(Tab, '_')),
 3359:     false = dets:info(Tab, safe_fixed),
 3360:     dets:traverse(Tab, fun(_) -> continue end),
 3361:     false = dets:info(Tab, safe_fixed),
 3362:     N = dets:foldl(fun(_, N2) -> N2+1 end, 0, Tab),
 3363:     false = dets:info(Tab, safe_fixed),
 3364:     N = dets:foldr(fun(_, N2) -> N2+1 end, 0, Tab),
 3365:     false = dets:info(Tab, safe_fixed),
 3366:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3367:     file:delete(File),
 3368:     ok.

 3370: %% OTP-11709. Bugfixes.
 3371: otp_11709(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3372:     Short = <<"foo">>,
 3373:     Long = <<"a sufficiently long text">>,
 3374: 
 3375:     %% Bug: leaking file descriptor
 3376:     P0 = pps(),
 3377:     File = filename(otp_11709, Config),
 3378:     ok = file:write_file(File, Long),
 3379:     false = dets:is_dets_file(File),
 3380:     check_pps(P0),
 3381: 
 3382:     %% Bug: deleting file
 3383:     Args = [[{access, A}, {repair, R}] ||
 3384:                A <- [read, read_write],
 3385:                R <- [true, false, force]],
 3386:     Fun1 = fun(S, As) ->
 3387:                    P1 = pps(),
 3388:                    ok = file:write_file(File, S),
 3389:                    {error,{not_a_dets_file,File}} = dets:open_file(File, As),
 3390:                    {ok, S} = file:read_file(File),
 3391:                    check_pps(P1)
 3392:            end,
 3393:     Fun2 = fun(S) ->
 3394:                    _ = [Fun1(S, As) || As <- Args],
 3395:                    ok
 3396:            end,
 3397:     ok = Fun2(Long),  % no change here
 3398:     ok = Fun2(Short), % mimic the behaviour for longer files
 3399: 
 3400:     %% open_file/1
 3401:     ok = file:write_file(File, Long),
 3402:     {error,{not_a_dets_file,File}} = dets:open_file(File), % no change
 3403:     ok = file:write_file(File, Short),
 3404:     {error,{not_a_dets_file,File}} = dets:open_file(File), % mimic
 3405: 
 3406:     _ = file:delete(File),
 3407:     ok.

 3409: %% OTP-13229. open_file() exits with badarg when given binary file name.
 3410: %% Also OTP-15253.

 3415:             exit({open_succeeded, R})
 3416:     catch
 3417:         error:badarg ->
 3418:             ok
 3419:     end,

 3421:         R2 ->
 3422:             exit({open_succeeded, R2})
 3423:     catch
 3424:         error:badarg ->
 3425:             ok
 3426:     end,
 3427:     try dets:open_file(F) of
 3428:         R3 ->
 3429:             exit({open_succeeded, R3})
 3430:     catch
 3431:         error:badarg ->
 3432:             ok

 3435: %% OTP-13260. Race when opening a table.
 3436: otp_13260(Config) ->
 3437:     [ok] = lists:usort([otp_13260_1(Config) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 3)]),
 3438:     ok.
 3439: 
 3440: otp_13260_1(Config) ->
 3441:     Tab = otp_13260,
 3442:     File = filename(Tab, Config),
 3443:     N = 20,
 3444:     P = self(),
 3445:     Pids = [spawn_link(fun() -> counter(P, Tab, File) end) ||
 3446:                _ <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3447:     Rs = rec(Pids),
 3448:     true = lists:all(fun(R) -> is_integer(R) end, Rs),
 3449:     wait_for_close(Tab).
 3450: 
 3451: rec([]) ->
 3452:     [];
 3453: rec([Pid | Pids]) ->
 3454:     receive {Pid, R} ->
 3455:             [R | rec(Pids)]
 3456:     end.
 3457: 
 3458: %% One may have to run the test several times to trigger the bug.
 3459: counter(P, Tab, File) ->
 3460:     Key = key,
 3461:     N = case catch dets:update_counter(Tab, Key, 1) of
 3462:             {'EXIT', _} ->
 3463:                 {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, File}]),
 3464:                 ok = dets:insert(Tab, {Key, 1}),
 3465:                 dets:update_counter(Tab, Key, 1);
 3466:             N1 when is_integer(N1) ->
 3467:                 N1;
 3468:             DetsBug ->
 3469:                 DetsBug
 3470:         end,
 3471:     P ! {self(), N}.
 3472: 
 3473: wait_for_close(Tab) ->
 3474:     case dets:info(Tab, owner) of
 3475:         undefined ->
 3476:             ok;
 3477:         _ ->
 3478:             timer:sleep(100),
 3479:             wait_for_close(Tab)
 3480:     end.
 3481:

 3484:     Tab = otp_13830,
 3485:     File8 = filename:join(?datadir(Config), "version_8.dets"),
 3486:     {error,{format_8_no_longer_supported,_}} =
 3487:         dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, File8}]),
 3488:     File = filename(Tab, Config),
 3489:     %% Check the 'version' option, for backwards compatibility:
 3490:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, File}, {version, 9}]),
 3491:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3492:     {ok, Tab} = dets:open_file(Tab, [{file, File}, {version, default}]),
 3493:     ok = dets:close(Tab).
 3494: 
 3495: receive_optimisation(Config) ->
 3496:     Tab = dets_receive_optimisation_test,
 3497:     FName = filename(Tab, Config),
 3498: 
 3499:     % Spam message box
 3500:     lists:foreach(fun(_) -> self() ! {spam, it} end, lists:seq(1, 1_000_000)),
 3501: 
 3502:     {ok, _} = dets:open_file(Tab,[{file, FName}]),
 3503:     ok = dets:insert(Tab,{one, record}),
 3504: 
 3505:     StartTime = os:system_time(millisecond),
 3506: 
 3507:     % We expect one thousand of simple lookups to finish in one second
 3508:     Lookups = 1000,
 3509:     Timeout = 1000,
 3510:     Loop =  fun Loop(N) when N =< 0 -> ok;
 3511: 		Loop(N) ->
 3512: 		    Now = os:system_time(millisecond),
 3513: 		    (Now - StartTime > Timeout) andalso throw({timeout_after, Lookups - N}),
 3514: 		    [{one, record}] = dets:lookup(Tab, one),
 3515: 		    Loop(N-1)
 3516: 	    end,
 3517: 
 3518:     ok = Loop(Lookups),
 3519: 
 3520:     ok = dets:close(Tab),
 3521:     ok = file:delete(FName).

 3527: crash(File, Where) ->
 3528:     crash(File, Where, 10).
 3529: 
 3530: crash(File, Where, What) when is_integer(What) ->
 3531:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,write]),
 3532:     file:position(Fd, Where),
 3533:     ok = file:write(Fd, [What]),
 3534:     ok = file:close(Fd).
