 3536: args(Config) ->
 3537:     {Sets, Bags, Dups} = 
 3538: 	{[
 3539: 	  [], 
 3540: 	  [{type, set}, {estimated_no_objects, 300},  
 3541: 	   {ram_file, true}],
 3542: 	  [{type, set}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3543: 	  [{type, set}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3544: 	  [{auto_save,20}, {type, set}, 
 3545: 	   {estimated_no_objects, 300}] 
 3546: 	 ],
 3547: 
 3548: 	 [
 3549: 	  [{type, bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}, {ram_file, true}],
 3550: 	  [{type, bag}],
 3551: 	  [{type, bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3552: 	  [{type, bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3553: 	  [{type, bag}, 
 3554: 	   {auto_save,20}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3555: 	  [{type, bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300},   {ram_file, true}]
 3556: 	 ],
 3557: 
 3558: 	 [
 3559: 	  [{type, duplicate_bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}, 
 3560: 	   {ram_file, true}],
 3561: 	  [{type, duplicate_bag}],
 3562: 	  [{type, duplicate_bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3563: 	  [{type, duplicate_bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3564: 	  [{type, duplicate_bag},
 3565: 	   {auto_save,20}, {estimated_no_objects, 300}],
 3566: 	  [{type, duplicate_bag}, {estimated_no_objects, 300},   
 3567: 	   {ram_file, true}]
 3568: 	 ]
 3569: 	},
 3570:     zip_filename(Sets, Bags, Dups, Config).
 3571: 
 3572: zip_filename(S, B, D, Conf) ->
 3573:     zip_filename(S, B, D, [], [], [], 1, Conf).
 3574: 
 3575: zip_filename([H|T], B, D, S1, B1, D1, I, Conf) ->
 3576:     zip_filename(T, B, D, [[{file, new_filename(I, Conf)} | H] | S1],
 3577: 		 B1, D1, I+1, Conf);
 3578: zip_filename([], [H|B], D, S1, B1, D1, I, Conf) ->
 3579:     zip_filename([], B, D, S1, [[{file, new_filename(I, Conf)} | H] | B1],
 3580: 		 D1, I+1, Conf);
 3581: zip_filename([], [], [H|T], S1, B1, D1, I, Conf) ->
 3582:     zip_filename([], [], T, S1, B1, [[{file, new_filename(I, Conf)} | H] | D1],
 3583: 		 I+1, Conf);
 3584: zip_filename([], [], [], S1, B1, D1, _, _Conf) ->
 3585:     {reverse(S1), reverse(B1), reverse(D1)}.
 3586: 
 3587: del_test(Tab) ->
 3588:     ?format("Deltest on ~p~n", [Tab]),
 3589:     Objs = safe_get_all_objects(Tab),
 3590:     Keys = map(fun(X) -> element(1, X) end, Objs),
 3591:     foreach(fun(Key) -> dets:delete(Tab, Key) end, Keys),
 3592:     0 = length(get_all_objects(Tab)),
 3593:     [] = get_all_objects_fast(Tab),
 3594:     0 = dets:info(Tab, size).
 3595: 
 3596: del_obj_test(Tab) ->
 3597:     ?format("Delobjtest on ~p~n", [Tab]),
 3598:     Objs = safe_get_all_objects(Tab),
 3599:     LL = length(Objs),
 3600:     LL = dets:info(Tab, size),
 3601:     foreach(fun(Obj) -> dets:delete_object(Tab, Obj) end, Objs),
 3602:     0 = length(get_all_objects(Tab)),
 3603:     [] = get_all_objects_fast(Tab),
 3604:     0 = dets:info(Tab, size).
 3605: 
 3606: match_del_test(Tab) ->
 3607:     ?format("Match delete test on ~p~n", [Tab]),
 3608:     ok = dets:match_delete(Tab, {'_','_','_'}),
 3609:     Sz = dets:info(Tab, size),
 3610:     true = Sz =:= length(dets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 3611:     ok = dets:match_delete(Tab, '_'),
 3612:     0 = dets:info(Tab, size),
 3613:     0 = length(get_all_objects(Tab)),
 3614:     [] = get_all_objects_fast(Tab).
 3615: 
 3616: trav_test(_Data, Len, Tab) ->
 3617:     ?format("Travtest on ~p~n", [Tab]),
 3618:     _X0 = dets:traverse(Tab, fun(_X) -> continue end),
 3619:     XX = dets:traverse(Tab, fun(X) -> {continue, X} end),
 3620:     case Len =:= length(XX) of
 3621: 	      false -> ?format("DIFF ~p~n", [XX -- _Data]);
 3622: 	      true -> ok
 3623: 	  end,
 3624:     1 = length(dets:traverse(Tab, fun(X) -> {done, X} end)).
 3625: 
 3626: match_test(Data, Tab) ->
 3627:     ?format("Match test on ~p~n", [Tab]),
 3628:     Data1 = sort(filter(fun(X) when tuple_size(X) =:= 3 -> true;
 3629:                            (_X) -> false
 3630:                         end, Data)),
 3631:     Data1 = sort(dets:match_object(Tab, {'$1', '$2', '$3'})),
 3632: 
 3633:     Len = length(Data),
 3634:     Len = length(dets:match(Tab, '_')),
 3635:     Len2 = length(Data1),
 3636:     Len2 = length(dets:match(Tab, {'$1', '_', '_'})),
 3637:     
 3638:     Data3 =
 3639: 	filter(fun(X) ->
 3640: 		       K = element(1, X),
 3641: 		       if
 3642: 			   tuple_size(X) =:= 3, tuple_size(K) =:= 2 -> true;
 3643: 			   true -> false
 3644: 		       end
 3645: 	       end, Data),
 3646:     Len3 = length(Data3),
 3647:     Len3 = length(dets:match(Tab, {{'$1', '$2'}, '_', '_'})),
 3648:     Len3 = length(dets:match_object(Tab, {{'$1', '$2'}, '_', '_'})),
 3649:     
 3650:     R = make_ref(),
 3651:     dets:insert(Tab, {{R, R}, 33 ,44}),
 3652:     1 = length(dets:match(Tab, {{R, R}, '_', '_'})),
 3653:     1 = length(dets:match_object(Tab, {{R, R}, '_', '_'})).
 3654: 
 3655: %%
 3656: %% Utilities
 3657: %%
 3658: 
 3659: headsz() ->
 3660:     ?HEADSZ_v9.
 3661: 
 3662: unwritable(Fname) ->
 3663:     {ok, Info} = file:read_file_info(Fname),
 3664:     Mode = Info#file_info.mode - 8#00200,
 3665:     file:write_file_info(Fname, Info#file_info{mode = Mode}).
 3666: 
 3667: writable(Fname) ->
 3668:     {ok, Info} = file:read_file_info(Fname),
 3669:     Mode = Info#file_info.mode bor 8#00200,
 3670:     file:write_file_info(Fname, Info#file_info{mode = Mode}).
 3671: 
 3672: truncate(File, Where) ->
 3673:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,write]),
 3674:     file:position(Fd, Where),
 3675:     ok = file:truncate(Fd),
 3676:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 3677: 
 3678: new_filename(Name, _Config) when is_integer(Name) ->
 3679:     filename:join(?privdir(_Config),
 3680: 		  integer_to_list(Name) ++ ".DETS").
 3681: 
 3682: filename(Name, Config) when is_atom(Name) ->
 3683:     filename(atom_to_list(Name), Config);
 3684: filename(Name, _Config) ->
 3685:     filename:join(?privdir(_Config), Name).
 3686: 
 3687: open_files(_Name, []) ->
 3688:     [];
 3689: open_files(Name0, [Args | Tail]) ->
 3690:     ?format("init ~p~n", [Args]),
 3691:     Name = list_to_atom(integer_to_list(Name0)),
 3692:     {ok, Name} = dets:open_file(Name, Args),
 3693:     [Name | open_files(Name0+1, Tail)].
 3694:     
 3695: close_all(Tabs) -> foreach(fun(Tab) -> ok = dets:close(Tab) end, Tabs).
 3696: 
 3697: delete_files(Args) ->   
 3698:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 3699: 		  {value, {file, File}} = keysearch(file, 1, F),
 3700: 		  file:delete(File),
 3701: 		  File
 3702: 	  end,
 3703:     map(Fun, Args).
 3704: 
 3705: %% Initialize all tables
 3706: initialize(Tabs, Data) ->
 3707:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
 3708:                     Fun = fun(Obj) -> ok =  dets:insert(Tab, Obj) end,
 3709:                     foreach(Fun, Data),
 3710:                     dets:sync(Tab)
 3711:             end, Tabs).
 3712: 
 3713: %% need more than 512 objects to really trig overflow
 3714: make_data(Kp) ->
 3715:     make_data(Kp, set).
 3716: 
 3717: make_data(Kp, Type) ->
 3718:     dup(Type, make_data(Kp, Type, 520)).
 3719: 
 3720: dup(duplicate_bag, [H1, H2 |T]) ->
 3721:     [H1,H2, H1, H2 | dup(duplicate_bag, T)];
 3722: dup(_, Other) ->
 3723:     Other.
 3724:     
 3725: make_data(_Kp, Type, 0) -> 
 3726:     odd_keys(Type);
 3727: make_data(1, set, I) ->
 3728:     [{I, q,w} | make_data(1, set, I-1)];
 3729: make_data(2, set, I) ->
 3730:     [{hh, I, q,w} | make_data(2, set, I-1)];
 3731: make_data(1, bag, I) ->
 3732:     [{I, q,w} , {I, hah, 77} | make_data(1, bag, I-1)];
 3733: make_data(2, bag, I) ->
 3734:     [{hh, I, q,w} , {hh, I, lalal, 900} | make_data(2, bag, I-1)];
 3735: make_data(1, duplicate_bag, I) ->
 3736:     [{I, q,w} , {I, hah, 77} | make_data(1, duplicate_bag, I-1)];
 3737: make_data(2, duplicate_bag, I) ->
 3738:     [{hh, I, q,w} , {hh, I, lalal, 900} | make_data(2, duplicate_bag, I-1)].
 3739: 
 3740: odd_keys(_) ->
 3741:     [{foo, 1 ,2},
 3742:      {{foo, foo}, 2,3},
 3743:      {"kakaka", {{{}}}, jj},
 3744:      {{"kallll", "kkk", []}, 66.7777},
 3745:      {make_ref(), 99, 66},
 3746:      {{1},2,3,4,5,6,7,duplicate(50, 8)},
 3747:      {self(), 7,8,88},
 3748:      {[self()], 8, 11}].
 3749: 
 3750: 
 3751: ins(_T, 0) ->
 3752:     ok;
 3753: ins(T, N) ->
 3754:     case dets:insert(T, {N, item(N)}) of
 3755: 	ok -> ins(T, N-1);
 3756: 	Error -> Error
 3757:     end.
 3758: 
 3759: item(N) when N rem 2 =:= 0 ->
 3760:     {item, number, N};
 3761: item(N) ->
 3762:     {item, number, N, a, much, bigger, one, i, think}.
 3763: 
 3764: del(_T, N, _I) when N =< 0 ->
 3765:     ok;
 3766: del(T, N, I) ->
 3767:     ok = dets:delete(T, N),
 3768:     del(T, N-I, I).
 3769: 
 3770: ensure_node(0, _Node) ->
 3771:     could_not_start_node;
 3772: ensure_node(N, Node) ->
 3773:     case net_adm:ping(Node) of
 3774: 	pang ->
 3775: 	    receive after 1000 ->
 3776: 			     ok
 3777: 		    end,
 3778: 	    ensure_node(N-1,Node);
 3779: 	pong ->
 3780: 	    ok
 3781:     end.
 3782: 
 3783: size_test(Len, Tabs) ->
 3784:     foreach(fun(Tab) ->
 3785:                     Len = dets:info(Tab, size)
 3786:             end, Tabs).
 3787: 
 3788: no_keys_test([T | Ts]) ->
 3789:     no_keys_test(T),
 3790:     no_keys_test(Ts);
 3791: no_keys_test([]) ->
 3792:     ok;
 3793: no_keys_test(T) ->
 3794:     Kp = dets:info(T, keypos),
 3795:     All = dets:match_object(T, '_'),
 3796:     L = lists:map(fun(X) -> element(Kp, X) end, All),
 3797:     NoKeys = length(lists:usort(L)),
 3798:     case {dets:info(T, no_keys), NoKeys} of
 3799:         {N, N} ->
 3800:             ok;
 3801:         {N1, N2} ->
 3802:             exit({no_keys_test, N1, N2})
 3803:     end.
 3804: 
 3805: safe_get_all_objects(Tab) ->
 3806:     dets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 3807:     Objects = get_all_objects(Tab),
 3808:     dets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 3809:     Objects.
 3810: 
 3811: %% Caution: unless the table has been fixed, strange results can be returned.
 3812: get_all_objects(Tab) -> get_all_objects(dets:first(Tab), Tab, []).
 3813: 
 3814: %% Assuming no key matches {error, Reason}...
 3815: get_all_objects('$end_of_table', _Tab, L) -> L;
 3816: get_all_objects({error, Reason}, _Tab, _L) ->
 3817:     exit({get_all_objects, {error, Reason}});
 3818: get_all_objects(Key, Tab, L) -> 
 3819:     Objs = dets:lookup(Tab, Key),
 3820:     get_all_objects(dets:next(Tab, Key), Tab, Objs ++ L).
 3821: 
 3822: count_objects_quite_fast(Tab) ->
 3823:     R1 = dets:match_object(Tab, '_', 1),
 3824:     count_objs_1(R1, 0).
 3825: 
 3826: count_objs_1('$end_of_table', N) ->
 3827:     N;
 3828: count_objs_1({Ts,C}, N) when is_list(Ts) ->
 3829:     count_objs_1(dets:match_object(C), length(Ts) + N).
 3830: 
 3831: get_all_objects_fast(Tab) ->
 3832:     dets:match_object(Tab, '_').
 3833: 
 3834: histogram(Tab) ->
 3835:     OnePercent = case dets:info(Tab, no_slots) of
 3836: 	undefined -> undefined;
 3837: 	{_, NoSlots, _} -> NoSlots/100
 3838:     end,
 3839:     histogram(Tab, OnePercent).
 3840: 
 3841: histogram(Tab, OnePercent) ->
 3842:     E = ets:new(histo, []),
 3843:     dets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 3844:     Hist = histo(Tab, E, 0, OnePercent, OnePercent),
 3845:     dets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 3846:     case Hist of
 3847:         ok ->
 3848:             H = ets:tab2list(E),
 3849:             true = ets:delete(E),
 3850:             sort(H);
 3851:         Error ->
 3852:             ets:delete(E),
 3853:             Error
 3854:     end.
 3855: 
 3856: histo(T, E, I, One, Count) when is_number(Count), I > Count ->
 3857:     io:format("."),
 3858:     histo(T, E, I, One, Count+One);
 3859: histo(T, E, I, One, Count) ->
 3860:     case dets:slot(T, I) of
 3861:         '$end_of_table' when is_number(Count) ->
 3862:             io:format("~n"),
 3863:             ok;
 3864:         '$end_of_table' ->
 3865:             ok;
 3866:         Objs when is_list(Objs) ->
 3867:             L = length(Objs),
 3868:             case catch ets:update_counter(E, L, 1) of
 3869:                 {'EXIT', _} ->
 3870:                     ets:insert(E, {L, 1});
 3871:                 _ ->
 3872:                     ok
 3873:             end,
 3874:             histo(T, E, I+1, One, Count);
 3875:         Error ->
 3876:             Error
 3877:     end.
 3878: 
 3879: sum_histogram(H) ->
 3880:     sum_histogram(H, 0).
 3881: 
 3882: sum_histogram([{S,N1} | H], N) ->
 3883:     sum_histogram(H, N + S*N1);
 3884: sum_histogram([], N) ->
 3885:     N.
 3886: 
 3887: ave_histogram(H) ->
 3888:     ave_histogram(H, 0)/sum_histogram(H).
 3889: 
 3890: ave_histogram([{S,N1} | H], N) ->
 3891:     ave_histogram(H, N + S*S*N1);
 3892: ave_histogram([], N) ->
 3893:     N.
 3894: 
 3895: bad_object({error,{{bad_object,_}, FileName}}, FileName) ->
 3896:     ok; % No debug.
 3897: bad_object({error,{{{bad_object,_,_},_,_,_}, FileName}}, FileName) ->
 3898:     ok. % Debug.
 3899: 
 3900: check_badarg({'EXIT', {badarg, [{M,F,Args,_} | _]}}, M, F, Args) ->
 3901:     true.
 3902: 
 3903: check_pps({Ports0,Procs0} = P0) ->
 3904:     ok = check_dets_tables(),
 3905:     case pps() of
 3906:         P0 ->
 3907:             ok;
 3908:         _ ->
 3909:             %% On some (rare) occasions the dets process is still
 3910:             %% running although the call to close() has returned, as
 3911:             %% it seems...
 3912:             timer:sleep(500),
 3913:             case pps() of
 3914:                 P0 ->
 3915:                     ok;
 3916:                 {Ports1,Procs1} = P1 ->
 3917: 		    case {Ports1 -- Ports0, Procs1 -- Procs0} of
 3918: 			{[], []} -> ok;
 3919: 			{PortsDiff,ProcsDiff} ->
 3920: 			    io:format("failure, got ~p~n, expected ~p\n", [P1, P0]),
 3921: 			    show("Old port", Ports0 -- Ports1),
 3922: 			    show("New port", PortsDiff),
 3923: 			    show("Old proc", Procs0 -- Procs1),
 3924: 			    show("New proc", ProcsDiff),
 3925: 			    ct:fail(failed)
 3926: 		    end
 3927: 	    end
 3928:     end.
 3929: 
 3930: %% Copied from dets_server.erl:
 3931: -define(REGISTRY, dets_registry).
 3932: -define(OWNERS, dets_owners).
 3933: -define(STORE, dets).
 3934: 
 3935: check_dets_tables() ->
 3936:     Store = [T ||
 3937:                 T <- ets:all(),
 3938:                 ets:info(T, name) =:= ?STORE,
 3939:                 owner(T) =:= dets],
 3940:     S = case Store of
 3941:             [Tab] -> ets:tab2list(Tab);
 3942:             [] -> []
 3943:         end,
 3944:     case {ets:tab2list(?REGISTRY), ets:tab2list(?OWNERS), S} of
 3945:         {[], [], []} -> ok;
 3946:         {R, O, _} ->
 3947:             io:format("Registry: ~p~n", [R]),
 3948:             io:format("Owners: ~p~n", [O]),
 3949:             io:format("Store: ~p~n", [S]),
 3950:             not_ok
 3951:     end.
 3952: 
 3953: owner(Tab) ->
 3954:     Owner = ets:info(Tab, owner),
 3955:     case process_info(Owner, registered_name) of
 3956: 	{registered_name, Name} -> Name;
 3957: 	_ -> Owner
 3958:     end.
 3959: 
 3960: show(_S, []) ->
 3961:     ok;
 3962: show(S, [{Pid, Name, InitCall}|Pids]) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3963:     io:format("~s: ~w (~w), ~w: ~p~n",
 3964:               [S, Pid, proc_reg_name(Name), InitCall,
 3965:                erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
 3966:     show(S, Pids);
 3967: show(S, [{Port, _}|Ports]) when is_port(Port)->
 3968:     io:format("~s: ~w: ~p~n", [S, Port, erlang:port_info(Port)]),
 3969:     show(S, Ports).
 3970: 
 3971: pps() ->
 3972:     dets:start(),
 3973:     {port_list(), process_list()}.
 3974: 
 3975: port_list() ->
 3976:     [{P,safe_second_element(erlang:port_info(P, name))} || 
 3977:         P <- erlang:ports()].
 3978: 
 3979: process_list() ->
 3980:     [{P,process_info(P, registered_name),
 3981:       safe_second_element(process_info(P, initial_call))} || 
 3982:         P <- processes()].
 3983: 
 3984: proc_reg_name({registered_name, Name}) -> Name;
 3985: proc_reg_name([]) -> no_reg_name.
 3986: 
 3987: safe_second_element({_,Info}) -> Info;
 3988: safe_second_element(Other) -> Other.
